column3: Liorish shoh ta shin toiggal graih Yee , ayns dy dug eh sheese e vioys er nyn son : as lhisagh shinyn nyn mioys y chur sheese son ny braaraghyn .

Nish , roish feailley ny Caisht , as fys ec Yeesey , dy row yn oor echey er jeet , tra v’eh dy gholl ass y theihll shoh gys yn Ayr , myr v’eh graihagh er e vooinjer hene , va ayns y theihll , hug eh graih daue gys y jerrey .
Agh quoi liorish v’eh er ny vrasnaghey da-eed bleïn ? nagh nee lioroosyn v’er n’yannoo peccah , ny callinyn oc huitt ’syn aasagh ?
Myr cloan biallagh , cha nee cummey shiu hene cordail rish ny shenn chliaghtaghyn , ayns y vee-hushtey eu :
Son ta Jee er yeigh ad seose ooilley cooidjagh fo mee-viallys dy voddagh eh myghin y hoilshaghey er ooilley .
As cheayll mee coraa veih mastey ny kiare cretooryn , gra , Towse dy churnaght son ping , as three towseyn dy oarn son ping ; as ny jean aggair da’n ooil as y feeyn .
Bee-jee er nyn injillaghey ayns shilley’n Chiarn , as troggee eh shiu seose .

Er-yn-oyr dy vel eh er n’oardaghey laa ry-hoi yn seihll y vriwnys ayns cairys , liorish y dooinney shen t’eh er phointeil ; as jeh shoh t’eh er chur shickyrys da dy chooilley ghooinney , ayns dy vel eh er hroggal eshyn veih ny merriu .
As fee ny sidooryn attey dy ghrineyn , as hug ad eh er e chione , as hug ad er coamrey purple .
Saillym er-y-fa shen dy jean ny mraane saa poosey , cloan y ymmyrkey , yn thie y reill , gyn veg yn oyr y choyrt da’n noid dy loayrt dy scammyltagh .
Cred-jee mish , dy vel mee ayns yn Ayr , as yn Ayr aynym’s : er-nonney cred-jee mee er graih ny eer obbraghyn .
As va’n baase as yn oaie er nyn dilgey ayns y logh dy aile : Shoh’n nah vaase .

( Son eisht beign da v’er hurranse dy mennick er-dy hoshiaght y theihll ) agh nish un cheayrt son ooilley ayns ny eashyn s’jerree , t’eh er hoilshaghey eh-hene dy chur ersooyl peccah liorish jannoo eh-hene ny oural .
As mysh da-eed bleïn dy hraa dymmyrk eh ayns yn aasagh lesh nyn ghrogh-ellyn .
Shen-y-fa , my vraaraghyn , tra ta shiu cheet cooidjagh dy ee , fuirree-jee yn derrey yeh son y jeh elley .
As honnick mee tra doshil eh yn cheyoo seal , as cur-my-ner , va craa mooar thallooin ayn , as haink y ghrian dy ve doo myr aanrit-sack geyshteenagh , as va’n eayst myr fuill :
Hooar mraane nyn merriu troggit gys bioys reesht : as feallagh elley v’er nyn dorchaghey , gyn jannoo soiagh jeh livrey-ys ; dy voddagh ad irree-seose-reesht share y chosney .

Agh dooyrt Paul roo , T’ad er nyn mwoalley dy foshlit ga dy nee Romanee shin , as neu-chyndagh , as er hilgey shin ayns pryssoon ; as vel ad nish dyn eiyrt shin magh dy follit ? shen red nagh jean ; agh lhig daue hene cheet as shin y chur lhieu magh .

Son shoh t’er ny ghra , Cha brish oo poosey , Cha jean oo dunverys , Cha jean oo geid , Cha n’ymmyrk oo feanish foalsey , Cha der oo saynt ; as my ta anney erbee elley , te ayns focklyn giarey goit stiagh fo’n raa shoh , ta shen , Ver oo graih da dty naboo myr dhyt hene .
As ta dy chooilley ghooinney ta’n treishteil shoh echey ayn hene , glenney eh-hene , dy jarroo myr t’eshyn glen .
Son ta taitnys aym ayns leigh Yee , cordail rish y dooinney er cheu-sthie .
Gow-jee boggey ayns y Chiarn dy kinjagh , as reesht ta mee gra , Gow-jee boggey .
As hyndaa mee dy akin cre voish haink y coraa ren loayrt rhym . As tra va mee er jyndaa , honnick mee shiaght cainleyryn dy airh ;
As quoi da ren eh loo , nagh ragh ad stiagh ’syn ea echey , agh dauesyn nagh ren credjal ?
Ta ooilley ny haink roym’s , nyn maarlee as nyn roosteyryn : agh cha dug ny kirree geill daue .
Harvaantyn , bee-jee biallagh da nyn mainshteryn lesh slane arrym , cha nee ny-lomarcan dauesyn ta mie as dooie , agh myrgeddin dauesyn ta creoi dy ghellal roo .
As hoie ad seose feanishyn foalsey , ren gra , Ta’n dooinney shoh kinjagh loayrt goan-mollaghtagh noi yn ynnyd casherick shoh as y leigh .
As ta dy chooilley nhee veih Jee , ta er choardail shinyn rish hene liorish Yeesey Creest , as ta er livrey dooin shirveish y choardail ;
My vraaraghyn , gow-jee ny phadeyryn , t’er loayrt ayns ennym y Chiarn , son sampleyr jeh surranse seaghyn , as jeh meenid .
As hig eh gy-kione , quoi-erbee eïe-ys er ennym y Chiarn , dy bee eh er ny hauail .
Gra , Amen : Bannaght , as gloyr , as creenaght , as booise , as ooashley , as pooar , as niart , dy row gys y Jee ainyn son dy bragh as dy bragh . Amen .
Yn soiaghey magh eu ayns nyn goamrey ny lhig da ve shen er y cheu-mooie jeh fee yn folt , ny ceau airh , ny cur erriu coamrey [ moyrnagh ] :
Ny bee nearey ort er-y-fa shen jeh recortys nyn Jiarn , ny jeem’s e phryssoonagh : agh gow uss ayrn mârym’s ayns seaghyn y tushtal , cordail rish pooar Yee ;
As er y ghraih ocsyn ta mish dy chasherickey mee hene , dy vod adsyn myrgeddin v’er nyn gasherickey gys yn irriney .
Bee er dty arrey , as niartee ny reddyn ta er-mayrn , ta aarloo dy gholl naardey : son cha vel mee er gheddyn dty obbraghyn dy slane cooilleenit fenish Yee .
As ren y trass ainle e chappan y gheayrtey magh er ny awinyn as farraneyn ushtey ; as haink ad dy ve fuill .
Liorishyn myrgeddin ta shin goit stiagh liorish credjue gys y ghrayse shoh ayn ta shin shassoo , as ta shin goaill boggey ayns treishteil dy ghloyr Yee .
Son shoh ta fys eu er , nagh vel ec maarderagh erbee , ny persoon neu-ghlen , ny ec dooinney sayntoilagh , ta coyrt ammys da jallooyn , eiraght eddyr ayns reeriaght Chreest as Yee .
Liorish credjue tra va Abraham er ny eam dy gholl magh gys ynnyd v’eh lurg-shen dy gheddyn son eiraght , v’eh biallagh ; as jimmee eh magh , gyn fys echey cre gys v’eh goll .
As ny bee-jee er meshtey lesh feeyn , ayn ta neu-heeltys ; agh bee-jee er nyn lhieeney lesh y Spyrryd ;
As eiyree ymmodee da ny raaidyn mollaghtagh oc , kyndagh roosyn bee raad yn irriney er ny oltooaney .
Son ny hrooidsyn ta kied ain ny-neesht dy hayrn er-gerrey gys yn Ayr liorish un Spyrryd .

As mychione ny Ashoonee t’er chredjal , ta shin er scrieu as er vriwnys , gyn ad dy eiyrt er ny cliaghtaghyn cheddin , agh ynrycan ad dy reayll ad-hene veie reddyn va chebbit gys jallooyn , as veih fuill , as veih reddyn toghtit , as veih maarderys .
Agh dooyrt Peddyr ; Ananias , cre’n-fa ta Satan er lhieeney dty chree dy yannoo breg gys y Spyrryd Noo , liorish keiltyn ayrn jeh price y thallooin ?

Nagh bee mayd maghey shoh nyn gloan lheaystey noon as noal , as eiyrit mygeayrt lesh dy chooilley gheay dy ynsagh , liorish kialgyn deiney , as ny croutyn cluicagh , lhieu t’ad lhie cooyl-chlea er-chee dy volley :

Nagh vel fys eu nagh vow ny mee-chrauee eiraght ayns reeriaght Yee ? Ny bee-jee mollit : chamoo yiow maarderee , ny adsyn ta cur ooashley da jallooyn , ny adsyn ta brishey-poosey , ny ny soailtee , ny adsyn ta cur rish peccah noi dooghys ,
Cha nee treigeil yn chaglym cooidjagh ain hene , myr ta cliaghtey paart ; agh coyrlaghey yn derrey yeh yn jeh elley : as wheesh shen smoo , myr ta shiu fakin yn laa tayrn er-gerrey .
Smaghtee-jee er-y-fa shen ny oltyn thallooinagh eu ; maarderys , neu-ghlennid , yeearree neu-chooie , drogh vian , as saynt seihltagh , ta dy chur ammys da jallooyn :
Agh lhig dooinyn ta jeh’n laa , ve sheelt , coyrt orrin yn breast-plate dy chredjue as graih , as son bayrn-caggee , yn treishteil dy haualtys .
Son cha vel Jee er choyrt dooin yn spyrryd dy aggle ; agh dy phooar , as dy ghraih , as dy chreenaght .
Eshyn ta gra , Ta enney aym er , as nagh vel freayll e annaghyn , t’eh ny vreagerey , as cha vel yn irriney ayn .
Jean-jee my voggey y yannoo magh , dy vod shiu ve jeh’n aigney cheddin , yn ghraih cheddin y ve eu , jeh un chree , jeh un smooinaghtyn .
Eisht v’ad shirrey y ghoaill eh : agh cha dug dooinney erbee laue er , son nagh row yn oor echey foast er jeet .
Dy jean ad mie , dy bee ad berchagh ayns obbraghyn mie , aignagh dy rheynn , arryltagh dy choyrt da ny boghtyn ;
Dreggyr adsyn as dooyrt ad , Er-be dy nee drogh-yantagh eh , cha beagh shin er livrey hood’s eh .

Eshyn ta freaylley’n laa , t’eh freaylley eh gys y Chiarn ; as eshyn nagh vel freaylley’n laa , gys y Chiarn cha vel eh dy reaylley eh . Eshyn ta gee , t’eh gee gys y Chiarn , son t’eh coyrt booise da Jee ; as eshyn nagh vel gee , gys y Chiarn cha vel eh gee , as t’eh coyrt booise da Jee .
Gennal ayns treishteil ; surransagh ayns seaghyn ; tannaghtyn kinjagh ayns padjer :
As doardee eh centurion kiarail y ghoaill jeh Paul , as e reamys y lhiggey da , gyn lhiettal veg jeh’n ainjys echey dy hirveish er , ny dy heet huggey .
Fuillaghtyn dagh nhee , credjal dagh nhee , treishteil dagh nhee , surranse dy chooilley nhee ,
Fakin dy vel ainyn yn spyrryd cheddin dy chredjue , myr te scruit , Ren mee credjal , as er-y-fa shen ren mee loayrt : ta shinyn neesht credjal , as er-y-fa shen loayrt ;

Nish ta shin guee erriu , vraaraghyn , cur-jee raaue dauesyn ta mee-reiltagh , jean-jee gerjaghey adsyn ta lhag-chreeagh , ymmyrk-jee lesh ny annooinee , bee-jee surransagh rish dy chooilley ghooinney .
As gheayrt y wheiggoo ainle e chappan er stoyl y veisht ; as va e reeriaght lane dy ghorraghys , as ren ad caigney ny chengaghyn oc son pian ;
As whilleen as ta gimmeeaght cordail rish yn oardagh shoh , shee dy row orroo , as myghin , as er Israel Yee .
Va ec y dooinney shoh ynsaghey ayns raad y Chiarn ; as lesh jeeanid ayns y spyrryd loayr eh as dynsee eh dy imneagh ny reddyn va bentyn rish y Chiarn , toiggal ynrycan bashtey Ean .
Shen-y-fa edyr shiu ve gee ny giu , ny cre-erbee ta shiu dy yannoo , jean-jee ooilley gys gloyr Yee .

Agh ta’n ooillaghey ta shiu er gheddyn veihsyn , tannaghtyn ayndiu : as cha vel feme eu dooinney erbee dy ynsaghey shiu : Agh myr ta’n ooillaghey cheddin gynsaghey shiu mychione dy chooilley nhee , as dy nee’n irriney eh , as cha nee breg : as dy jarroo myr t’eh er n’ynsaghey shiu , nee shiu tannaghtyn aynsyn .
Son myr ta’n corp fegooish y spyrryd marroo , myr shen ta credjue fegooish obbraghyn marroo myrgeddin .
As tra v’eh er ghra shoh , ghow eh arran , as hug eh booise da Jee , ayns yn enish oc ooilley , as vrish eh eh , as ren eh toshiaght dy ee .
Agh shin dy scrieu huc , ad dy reayll ad-hene veih eajeeys jallooyn , as veih maarderys , as veih [ gee ] reddyn toghtit , as veih fuill .
Eisht dooyrt Paul rish , Nee Jee uss y woalley , O voalley ghiallit : son vel uss soie dy my vriwnys cordail rish y leigh , as goardaghey mee dy ve bwoailt noi yn leigh ?
Cha vel er-y-fa shen deyrey erbee ny chour ocsyn t’ayns Creest Yeesey , nagh vel gimmeeaght lurg yn eill , agh lurg y Spyrryd .
Son cha vel Jee er phointeil shin gys corree ; agh dy chosney saualtys liorish nyn Jiarn Yeesey Creest ,
As hed eh magh dy volley ny ashoonyn t’ayns ny kiare ayrnyn jeh’n theihll , Gog as Magog , dy haglym ad dy cheilley gys caggey : nyn earroo ta myr genniagh ny marrey .
As nyn lheid va paart euish : agh va shiu er nyn niee , agh va shiu er nyn gasherickey , agh va shiu er nyn seyrey ayns ennym y Chiarn Yeesey , as liorish Spyrryd yn Jee ain .

Er-yn-oyr cheddin ta mee myrgeddin surranse ny reddyn shoh , ny-yeih cha vel nearey orrym : son shione dou eshyn ayn ta mee er chredjal , as ta mee feer shickyr dy vel eh abyl dy reayll shen ny ta mee er hymney gys e chiarail gys yn laa shen .
Guee dy kinjagh lesh dy chooilley phadjer as accan ayns y Spyrryd , as gys shoh er nyn arrey lesh slane tannaghtyn as aghin son ooilley ny nooghyn ;
Paul , as Sylvanus , as Timotheus , gys agglish ny Thessalonianee , ta ayns Jee yn Ayr , as ayns y Chiarn Yeesey Creest : Grayse dy row hiu , as shee voish Jee nyn Ayr , as y Chiarn Yeesey Creest .
Lhig da’n ymmyrkey meen eu ve cronnal da dy chooilley ghooinney . Ta’n Chiarn er-gerrey .
Son cha mennick as ee-ys shiu yn arran shoh , as iu-ys shiu yn cappan shoh , ta shiu soilshaghey magh baase y Chiarn derrey hig eh .
As nee’n phadjer lesh credjue yn aslayntagh y lheihys , as ver y Chiarn bea sodjey da ; as my t’eh er n’yannoo peccah , bee eh er ny leih da .
Ta mee cur booise gys Jee , eh ta mee dy hirveish veih my henn-ayraghyn lesh cooinsheanse ghlen , dy vel mee cooinaghtyn dy kinjagh ort ayns my phadjeryn oie as laa :
As dooyrt ad rish ny sleityn as ny creggyn , Tuitt-jee orrin , as follee shin veih’n eddin echeysyn ta ny hoie er y stoyl-reeoil , as veih corree yn Eayn :

Eshyn ta cleaysh echey , lhig eh clashtyn cre ta’n Spyrryd dy ghra rish ny kialteenyn . Dasyn ta geddyn yn varriaght ver-yms dy ee jeh’n manna follit , as ver-ym da clagh vane , as er y chlagh ennym noa scruit , nagh nione da dooinney erbee , agh eshyn ta dy gheddyn eh .
As trooid saynt nee ad lesh goan cluicagh jannoo merchantys jiu : yn kerraghey oc cha vel nish foddey jeh , as cha vel y deyrey oc saveenagh .
As er-yn-oyr shoh ver Jee huc cleayn lajer , dy jinnagh ad breg y chredjal :
Son ta ennym Yee oltooanit mastey ny Ashoonee , kyndagh riuish , myr te scruit .
Nish myr ren Jannes as Jambres girree noi Moses , myr shen t’ad shoh neesht shassoo magh noi’n irriney : deiney jeh aignaghyn mee-chrauee , caillit gys y chredjue .
Whilleen as ta mee graihagh orroo , ta mee cur oghsan daue , as dy smaghtaghey ad : bee jeean er-y-fa shen , as gow arrys .
Shen-y-fa er nyn seyrey liorish credjue , ta shee ain rish Jee , trooid nyn Jiarn Yeesey Creest .
Cur tastey dhyt hene , as da dty ynsagh ; jean tannaghtyn ayndoo : son ayns jannoo shoh , nee oo chammah oo hene y hauail , as adsyn ta dy dty chlashtyn .

As smaghtee mee ad dy mennick ayns dy chooilley synagogue , as dêginee mee ad dy oltooan [ Creest ] ; as va mee ass towse elgyssagh nyn ’oï oc , as ren mee tranlaase orroo gys eer ard-valjyn joarree .
Nish ta obbraghyn yn eill cronnal , as shoh ad , Brishey-poosey , maarderys , neu-ghlennid , rouanys ,
Myr shen eisht , cha vel eshyn ta dy hoiaghey jeh coontey erbee , chamoo eshyn ta dy ushtaghey : agh Jee , ta dy vishaghey .
Myr shen nagh vel shiu cheet er-gooyl ayns gioot erbee ; farkiagh son cheet y Chiarn Yeesey Creest ;
As cheayll mee coraa veih niau , myr sheean ymmodee ushtaghyn , as myr feiyr taarnagh mooar : as cheayll mee kiaull claaseyderyn cloie er nyn glaasaghyn :
Leshyn ta ooilley ny phadeyryn gymmyrkey feanish , trooid yn ennym echey , quoi-erbee chredjys ayn , dy vow eh feaysley peccaghyn .
Dauesyn , liorish tannaghtyn dy meen ayns jannoo mie , ta shirrey son gloyr , as ooashley , as flaunys ; yn vea dy bragh farraghtyn :
Ean gys ny shiaght kialteenyn t’ayns Asia : Grayse dy row hiu , as shee , veihsyn ta , as va , as ta ry-heet : as veih ny shiaght spyrrydyn ta kiongoyrt rish e stoyl-reeoil .
Eisht dooyrt Paul , Ren Ean dy firrinagh shirveish yn bashtey dy arrys , coyrlaghey yn pobble , Ad dy chredjal aynsyn harragh ny yeï , ta shen , ayns Creest Yeesey .
Ec y Chiarn ta fys kys dy livrey yn sleih crauee ass seaghyn , as dy reayll ny mee-chrauee gys laa ny briwnys dy ve er nyn gerraghey :
Agh nish t’ad geearree cheer share , ta shen , cheer flaunyssagh : shen-y-fa cha vel Jee mooaraghey dy ve enmyssit yn Jee ocsyn : son t’eh er chiarail ard-valley er nyn son .
Agh raaghyn mee-chrauee shenn vraane cur dy lhiattee , as gow myr reih dy gholl er dty hoshiaght ayns craueeaght .
As hie ad seose er lheead ny hooirey , as chruinnee ad camp ny nooghyn er dy chooilley heu , as yn ard-valley casherick : as haink aile neose ass niau veih Jee , as stroie eh ad .
As doardee eh ad dy v’er nyn mashtey ayns ennym y Chiarn . Eisht ghuee ad er dy uirriaght shiartanse dy laghyn .
As t’ou goaill ort hene , dy vel uss oo hene leeideilagh da ny doail , soilshey dauesyn t’ayns dorraghys ,
As shoh yn gialdyn t’eh er n’yannoo dooin , dy jarroo yn vea veayn .
Agh y chreenaght ta veih’n yrjey t’ee hoshiaght glen , eisht sheeoil , meen , as aashagh dy ve coyrlit , lane dy erreeish as dy vessyn mie , fegooish neu-chorrymid , as fegooish craueeaght-oalsey .
Ta’n Ayr graihagh er y Mac , as t’eh er chur dy chooilley nhee fo yn laue echey .

Cha vel y Chiarn moal mychione e ghialdynys , ( myr ta paart dy gheiney coontey meillid ) agh jeh surranse-foddey dooinyn , neu-wooiagh dy jinnagh unnane erbee cherraghtyn , agh dy darragh ooilley gys arrys .
Son baillym dy beagh dy chooilley ghooinney eer myr ta mee hene : agh ta e ghioot hene ec dagh dooinney veih Jee , fer er yn aght shoh , as fer er aght elley .
Eiyr-jee da graih [ creestee ] , as yeearree-jee dy jeean giootyn spyrrydoil , agh erskyn ooilley dy vod shiu bun y choyrt er goo Yee .
Son ta Jee , doardee yn soilshey dy hoilshean ass y dorraghys , er hoilshean ayns ny creeaghyn ain , dy chur soilshey jeh tushtey dy ghloyr Yee , ayns fenish Yeesey Creest .
As haink Hew dy row gys Ephesus , va enmyssit Appollos , ruggyr ec Alexandria , dooinney dy ghlare floaoil , as fondagh ayns ny scriptyryn .
Shen-y-fa ren Yeesey myrgeddin , dy voddagh eh yn pobble y chasherickey lesh e uill hene , surranse cheu-mooie jeh’n ghiat .
Ny reddyn shoh jean uss loayrt as coyrlaghey , as cur oghsan lesh slane ’torrity . Ny lhig da dooinney erbee beg y hoiaghey jeed .
Ayns shoh ta graih Yee er ny hoilshaghey dooinyn , er-yn-oyr dy ren Jee e ynrycan er ny-gheddyn Vac y choyrt gys y theihll , dy voddagh shin ve bio ny hrooidsyn .
Ayr , ta mee geearree adsyn t’ou er chur dou dy ve mârym raad ta mee ; dy vod ad fakin my ghloyr t’ou er chur dou : son t’ou er ve graihagh orrym’s roish my row yn seihll er ny chroo .
Ta toyrt-mow as treihys ayns nyn raaidyn :
Fakin dy vel ain eisht ard-saggyrt ooasle , t’er n’gholl stiagh ayns ny niaughyn , Yeesey Mac Yee , lhig dooin cummal shickyr nyn gredjue .
Son hooar eh veih Jee yn Ayr , onnor as gloyr , tra haink lheid y coraa huggeysyn veih’n ashlish ghloyroil , Shoh my Vac graihagh , jeh ta mee dy mooar soiaghey .
Agh ad shoh ooilley ta’n un as yn eer Spyrryd cheddin gobbraghey , rheynn er dy chooilley ghooinney er-lheh myr saillish hene .

As heid y chiarroo ainle , as va’n trass ayrn jeh’n ghrian fo dorraghys , as y trass ayrn jeh’n eayst , as y trass ayrn jeh ny rollageyn ; ayns wheesh as dy row yn trass ayrn jeu fo dorraghys , as cha daink y laa rish son y trass ayrn jeh , as yn oie myrgeddin .
Eisht ghow ooilley ny Greekyn Sosthenes , ard-fer-ynsee yn synagogue , as woaill ad eh kiongoyrt rish stoyl y vriwnys : as cha ren Gallio soiaghey scansh erbee jeh veg jeh ny reddyn shen .
Er shoh v’ad reesht son y ghoaill eh : agh chossyn eh ass nyn laueyn ,
Son yn oyr shen cha vel shin lhiggey nyn gree voïn , agh ga dy vel y dooinney ain er cheu-mooie goll naardey , foast ta’n dooinney er cheu-sthie er ny niartaghey laa lurg laa .
Eisht ghow Moirrey punt dy ooil dy spikenard feer chostal , as ren ee cassyn Yeesey y ooilaghey , as rub ee e chassyn lesh e folt : as va’n thie er ny lhieeney lesh soar yn ooil .
Liorish credjue v’eh ny hroailtagh ayns cheer y ghialdynys , myr ayns cheer yoarree , cummal ayns cabbaneyn marish Isaac as Jacob , co-eiraghyn mârishyn ’sy ghialdynys cheddin .
Vraaraghyn , eiyr-jee ry-cheilley orrym’s , as cur-jee tastey dauesyn ta gimmeeaght myr shen , myr ta shinyn eu son sampleyr .
Ymmyrk-jee erraghyn y cheilley , as myr shoh lhieen-jee yn leigh .
Hee shiu eisht kys dy nee liorish obbraghyn ta dooinney er ny heyrey , as cha nee liorish credjue ny-lomarcan .
Cre jir mayd eisht ? Vel neu-chairys marish Jee ? Ny lhig eh Jee .
Eshyn ta annoon ’sy chredjue gow-jee rish , agh cha nee gys jengleyrys dooyteilagh .
As va caggey ayns niau : ren Michael as e ainleyn caggey noi’n dragon , as ren y dragon as e ainleyn caggey ;
My hig corree erriu , ny jean-jee peccah . Ny lhig da’n ghrian lhie er y chorree eu :

As gow-jee yn helmet dy haualtys , as cliwe yn Spyrryd , shoh ta Goo Yee :

Cha vaag-ym shiu gyn gerjagh ; hig-yms hiu .

Shiuish harvaantyn , bee-jee biallagh dauesyn ta nyn mainshteryn cordail rish yn eill , lesh aggle as arrym , ayns ynrickys cree , myr da Creest :
Ny vel oo soiaghey beg jeh berchys e vieys , as e veenid , as surranse-foddey , gyn toiggal dy vel mieys Yee dy dty leeideil gys arrys ?
As shoh’n treishteil t’ain aynsyn , my hirrys shin nhee erbee cordail rish e aigney , t’eh geaishtagh rooin .
Nish dy jean y Jee dy hreishteil shiuish y lhieeney lesh dy chooilley voggey as shee ayns credjal , dy vod shiu bishaghey ayns treishteil trooid pooar y Spyrryd Noo .
Nish er-gerrey da’n ynnyd raad v’eh er ny chrossey , va garey ; as ayns y gharey oaie noa , ayn nagh jagh rieau dooinney er coyrt .

As va’n veisht goit , as marish yn phadeyr foalsey va gobbraghey mirrilyn ayns e euish , lhieu v’eh molley adsyn v’er ghoaill orroo cowrey’n veisht , as adsyn hug ooashley da e yalloo . V’ad shoh ny-neesht ceaut bio ayns logh dy aile lostey lesh brimstone .
Shen-y-fa my ta dty noid accryssagh , cur da bee ; my t’eh paagh , cur jough da : son liorish jannoo shoh nee oo cruinnaghey smarageyn dy aile er e chione .

Lhig da goo Chreest tannaghtyn ayndiu dy palchey ayns dy chooilley chreenaght ; gynsaghey as coyrlaghey yn derrey yeh yn jeh elley ayns psalmyn , as arraneyn moyllee as spyrrydoil , goaill arrane lesh grayse ayns nyn greeaghyn gys y Chiarn .
Gheiney-poost , cur-jee graih da ny mraane eu , as ny bee-jee sharroo nyn ’oï oc .

My ta mraane-treoghe mooinjerey ec dooinney ny ben erbee ta jeh’n chredjue , lhig daue kiarail y ghoaill jeu , as nagh bee’n currym oc er yn agglish ; dy vod ee cooney lhieusyn ta mraane-treoghe dy jarroo .
As shoh yn recortys , dy vel Jee er choyrt dooin yn vea dy bragh beayn : as ta’n vea shoh ayns e Vac .

My nee yn Mac er-y-fa shen shiuish seyr , bee shiu seyr dy jarroo .
Shen-y-fa ta mee guee erriu ny lhig shiu nyn gree veue ; son ny ta mish dy uilliaghtyn ayns y lieh euish , ta shoh yn ghloyr eu .
Son cha vel nyn lheid shirveish nyn Jiarn Yeesey Creest , agh nyn molg hene ; as liorish goan aalin as glare vrynneragh t’ad molley creeaghyn yn vooinjer ôney .
Laadit lesh dy chooilley neu-ynrickys , maarderys , olkys , saynt , goanlys ; lane dy hroo , dunverys , streeu , molteyraght , drogh-yannoo ; scammyltee cooyl-chlea ,
Yn gioal mie shen v’er ny choyrt fo dty chiarail , freill liorish y Spyrryd Noo ta baghey aynin .

As va oc eïlley-vroggil myr yiarn ; as va sheean nyn skianyn myr feiyr fainee ymmodee cabbil roie gys y chaggey .

As cha jed stiagh ayn er aght erbee red erbee neu-ghlen , chamoo nhee erbee ta gobbraghey eajeeys , ny jannoo foalsaght : agh adsyn ta scruit ayns lioar vea yn Eayn .
As va’n ven coamrit lesh purple , as scarleod , as soit magh dy stooamey lesh airh , as jewellyn costal , as pearlyn , lesh cappan airh ayns e laue , lane dy eajeeys , as broïd e maarderys .
As erskyn ooilley ny reddyn shoh , cur-jee erriu graih , ta’n eer kiangley dy oays firrinagh .
As dreggyr Yeesey ad , gra , Ta’n oor er jeet , dy vel yn Mac dooinney dy ve er ny ghloyraghey .
Uss ta gra nagh lhisagh dooinney poosey y vrishey , vel oo hene brishey poosey ? uss ta cur dwoaie ta jallooyn , vel uss dty vaarliagh er cooid chasherick ?
Agh peccah goaill vondeish liorish yn anney , ren gobbraghey aynym dy chooilley haynt . Son fegooish y leigh ta peccah marroo .
Fendeil oo veih yn pobble , as veih ny Ashoonee , huc ta mee nish dy dty choyrt ,

Son va shin hene myrgeddin keayrt dy row mee-hushtagh , mee-viallagh , ayns marranys , fo reill ymmodee yeearreeyn as eunyssyn peccoil , baghey ayns goanlys as roon , dwoaiagh , as coyrt dwoaie yn derrey yeh da’n jeh elley .

Ny lhig-jee veue , er-y-fa shen , yn dunnallys eu , nyn gour ta leagh mooar dy chooilleeney .
Ny sodjey , te currym er ny yerkal rish ayns stiurtyn dy bee dooinney er ny gheddyn firrinagh .
As haink eh gy-kione , dy duirree eh ymmodee laghyn ayns Joppa marish tanner dy row va enmyssit Simon .
Nagh vel fys eu dy nee shiuish chiamble Yee , as dy vel Spyrryd Yee baghey ayndiu ?
Fakin er-y-fa shen , my chaarjyn , dy vel ain reamys dy gholl stiagh gys yn ynnyd smoo casherick liorish fuill Yeesey ,
Eisht dooyrt Yeesey roo reesht , Ta mee goll roym , as nee shiu my hirrey , as yiow shiu baase ayns nyn beccaghyn : raad ta mish goll , cha vod shiuish cheet .
Cur-jee erriu er-y-fa shen ( myr cloan reiht Yee , casherick as graihagh ) meeaghyn dy vyghin , kenjallys , injillid-aigney , meenid , surranse-foddey ;
My nee dooinney erbee mish y hirveish , lhig da geiyrt orrym ; as y raad ta mish , shen y raad myrgeddin vees my harvaant : my nee dooinney erbee mish y hirveish , dasyn ver my Ayr onnor .
Dooinney ta gymmyrkey reill mie ayns e hie hene , as e chloan fo smaght lesh slane sheeltys ;
Shen-y-fa jean-jee gerjaghey shiu hene , as niartaghey yn derrey yeh yn jeh elley , dy jarroo myr ta shiu dy yannoo .
Son shoh’n chaghteraght ta shiu er chlashtyn er-dyn toshiaght , dy lhisagh shin ve graihagh yn derrey yeh er y jeh elley .
Ta mee jeeaghyn er eisht dy vel shoh mie kyndagh rish yn êgin t’ayn , ta mee gra , dy vel eh mie son dooinney dy chummal myr t’eh .
Va dooinney jeh ny Phariseeyn enmyssit Nicodemus , ny ard-ghooinney mastey ny Hewnyn :
Myrgeddin neesht , nagh row Rahab yn ven-oast er ny heyrey liorish obbraghyn , tra v’ee er n’ghoaill stiagh ny chaghteryn , as er choyrt magh ad raad elley ?
Foast , bee ee er ny hauail ayns gymmyrkey-lhiannoo , my nee ad tannaghtyn ayns credjue as graih , as craueeaght lesh sheeltys .
Ren Jee yn pobble shoh Israel ny ayraghyn ain y reih , as soiaghey mooar jeh’n pobble tra v’ad er nyn yoarreeaght ayns cheer Egypt , as lesh laue niartal hug eh lesh ad magh ass Egypt .
Agh dymmyrk Jee , fer-fysseree ny creeaghyn , feanish lhieu , as hug eh daue yn Spyrryd Noo , myr hug eh dooinyn .
Son eshyn dooyrt , Ny jean poosey vrishey ; dooyrt myrgeddin , Ny jean dunverys . Nish ga nagh vel oo brishey poosey , ny-yeih my t’ou dunverys , t’ou brishey’n leigh .
As ta mee cur daue yn vea veayn , as cha jean ad dy bragh cherraghtyn , as cha n’ghow fer erbee ad ass my laue er-niart .
As nee’n Jee dy hee dy gerrit Noid-ny-hanmey y vroo fo nyn gassyn . Grayse nyn Jiarn Yeesey Creest dy row mêriu . Amen .
Goaill orroo caslys dy chraueeaght , agh jannoo noi’n phooar [ vreeoil ] echey : veih nyn lheid chyndaa ersooyl .
Myr shen ta shinyn , ga ymmodee , un chorp ayns Creest , as dy chooilley unnane oltyn yn derrey yeh jeh’n jeh elley .

Shoh raa firrinagh , as ny reddyn shoh saillym oo kinjagh dy hionney orroo , dy vod adsyn ta er chredjal ayns Jee , ve kiaralagh dy hoilshaghey magh obbraghyn mie : ta ny reddyn shoh mie as vondeishagh da deiney .
As va’n scriptyr er ny chooilleeney ta gra , Chred Abraham Jee , as ve coontit da son cairys : as v’eh enmyssit carrey Yee .
My vraaraghyn , ny lhig da credjue nyn Jiarn gloyroil Yeesey Creest ve eu , jannoo soiagh jeh persoonyn deiney .
Ta’n scoarnagh oc oaie foshlit ; lesh nyn jengey t’ad er chliaghtey molteyrys ; ta pyshoon ard-nieughyn fo nyn meillyn :
Myr shen lhisagh deiney graih y choyrt da ny mraane oc myr da ny kirp oc hene : eshyn shynney lesh e ven , shynney lesh eh-hene .
Cre jir mayd eisht ? Dy vel ny Ashoonee nagh ren geiyrt er cairys , er roshtyn gys cairys dy jarroo yn chairys ta liorish credjue :
Freayll folliaght y chredjue ayns cooinsheanse ghlen .

As adsyn ta mainshteryn creestee oc , ny lhig daue soiaghey beg jeu , er-yn-oyr dy nee braaraghyn ad : agh lhig daue shirveish ad ny s’arryltee , son dy vel ad jeh’n [ un ] chredjue , as ayns graih [ Yee ] , goaill ayrn cooidjagh jeh’n bannaght . Ny reddyn shoh ynsee as coyrlee .
Son cre mannagh ren paart credjal ? jean y mee-chredjue ocsyn firrinys Yee y choyrt naardey ?
Agh ren fer jeh ny sidooryn lesh shleiy yn lhiattee echey y hoylley , as chelleeragh haink magh ass fuill as ushtey .
Shoh my harey , Shiu dy chur graih yn derrey yeh da’n jeh elley , myr ta mish er ve graihagh erriuish .
Chamoo livrey-jee seose nyn oltyn myr greinyn dy neu-chairys gys peccah : agh livrey-jee shiu hene seose gys Jee , myr adsyn ta bio veih ny merriu ; as nyn oltyn myr greinyn dy chairys gys Jee .
Agh cha vel shin jeh nyn lheid ta tayrn back gys y toyrt-mow oc hene ; agh jeusyn ta credjal , gys saualtys anmey .
As myr shen bee ooilley Israel er nyn sauail : myr te scruit , Hig saualtagh ass Sion , as chyndaa-ee eh ersooyl mee-chraueeaght voish Jacob .
Chur dy baase chammah yn Chiarn Yeesey , as ny phadeyryn oc hene , as er n’yannoo tranlaase orrin ; as cha vel ad pleasal Jee , as t’ad noi dy chooilley ghooinney :
Son my nee mayd peccah jeh nyn yoïn , lurg dooin v’er gheddyn toiggal jeh’n irriney , cha vel nyn gour oural arragh son peccaghyn ,
As t’eh er hroggal shin seose cooidjagh , as er hoiaghey shin cooidjagh ayns ynnydyn flaunyssagh ayns Creest Yeesey .
Shen-y-fa treigeil breagyn , lhig da dy chooilley ghooinney yn irriney y loayrt rish e naboo : son ta shin oltyn yn derrey yeh jeh’n jeh elley .
Agh daue shoh cha dug shin raad choud as un oor dy ve foue ; dy voddagh firrinys y tushtal tannaghtyn mêriu .
Shen-y-fa lhig dasyn ta loayrt ayns chengey yoarree , guee dy vod eh bun y choyrt er e ghlare .
As Saul foast fockley-magh haggyrtyn as baase noi credjuee yn Chiarn , jimmee eh gys yn ard-saggyrt ,
As nish ta mee cheet hood’s , as ny reddyn shoh ta mee dy loayrt ayns y theihll , dy vod y boggey aym’s y ve oc jeant magh ayndoo hene .
Agh gow-jee boggey , ayns wheesh as dy vel shiu goaill ayrn jeh surranseyn Chreest ; tra vees y ghloyr echeysyn er ny hoilshaghey , dy vod shiuish ve gennal myrgeddin lesh boggey erskyn earroo .
As tra va mee er yeeaghyn dy gyere er , as er ghoaill tastey , honnick mee beïyn kiare-chassagh y thallooin , as beïyn feïe , as cretooryn snauee , as eeanlee yn aer .
Agh nish cur-jee shiuish myrgeddin veue ooilley ny reddyn shoh ; corree , jymmoose , goanlys , goan mollaghtagh , glare neu-ghlen ass nyn meeal .
As er-yn-oyr dy row eh jeh’n un cheird roo , duirree eh as dobbree eh mâroo ( son jannoo cabbaneyn va’n cheird oc ) .
Ny lhig da peccah er-y-fa shen reill ayns nyn girp marvaanagh , dy jinnagh shiu eh y hirveish ayns ny yeearreeyn eck .
Nish dauesyn ta nyn lheid ta shin cur sarey , as raaue liorish nyn Jiarn Yeesey Creest , dy jean ad gobbraghey dy feagh , as gee yn arran oc hene .
Agh ny shenn-ayryn greinnit lesh troo chreck ad Joseph gys Egypt , agh va Jee mârish ,
As hass seose fer jeu enmyssit Agabus , as hoilshee eh liorish y Spyrryd dy beagh genney vooar er feaï-ny-cruinney ; shen haink myrgeddin gy-kione rish lhing Claudius Cesar .
As tra v’eh er ghra shoh , ghlioon eh sheese , as ghow eh padjer mâroo ooilley .
As adsyn ta lesh Creest , t’ad er chrossey yn eill , marish ny yeearreeyn as ny sayntyn .
My vraaraghyn , jeeagh-jee er myr oyr dy ard-voggey tra huittys shiu ayns caghlaaghyn dy heaghyn ;
My ta shin gra dy vel sheshaght ain mârishyn , as gimmeeaght ayns dorraghys , ta shin breagagh , as cha vel shin gra yn irriney :
As honnick eh niau er ny osley , as saagh dy row cheet neose huggey , myr dy beagh eh brelleein vooar , kianlt ec ny kiare binn , as lhiggit sheese er y thalloo :
Parthianee , as Medeyn , as Elamiteyn , as cummaltee Vesopotamia , as Judea , as Cappadocia , Pontus as Asia ,
Dy vod shiuish gimmeeaght ayns aght cooie dy wooiys y Chiarn ayns dy chooilley nhee , messoil ayns dagh obbyr vie , as bishaghey ayns tushtey Yee ;
Yn currym shoh ta mee dy hreishteil hood , vac Timothy , cordail rish y phadeyrys va jeant ro-laue my-dty-chione , dy vod oo liorish shen prowal oo hene dty hidoor mie ,
Lurg ny reddyn shoh cheayll mee sheean mooar myr jeh mooarane pobble ayns niau , gra , Alleluia : Saualtys , as gloyr , as ooashley , as pooar dy row gys y Chiarn y Jee ain :
As shiuish t’eh er vioghey , va marroo ayns loghtyn as peccah .
Cha vod shiu giu jeh cappan y Chiarn , as jeh cappan drogh-spyrrydyn : cha vod shiu ayrn y ghoaill ec boayrd y Chiarn , as ec boayrd drogh-spyrrydyn .
Agh maarderys , as dy chooilley neu-ghlennid , as saynt , ny lhig daue ve wheesh as enmyssit ny vud eu , myr te cooie da nooghyn :
Dauesyn ta glen ta dy chooilley nhee glen , agh dauesyn ta neu-ghlen , as mee-chrejuagh , cha vel nhee erbee glen ; agh ta eer nyn aigney as nyn gooinsheanse neu-ghlen .

Agh ghow ooilley ny va dy chlashtyn eh yindys mooar , as dooyrt ad , Nagh nee shoh eh va dy eiyrt gys baase adsyn va geamagh er yn ennym shoh ayns Jerusalem , as nagh daink eh er y chee shen dy chur lesh ad geulit gys ny ard-saggyrtyn ?
Agh nish t’eh er gheddyn shirveish foddey s’ooasle , ayns wheesh as dy vel eh myrgeddin eddyr Jee as shinyn son conaant share , va gruntit er gialdynyn syrjey .
Son dooys dy ve bio te [ son ] Creest , as dy gheddyn baase te cosney .
Myr ta shickyrys aym jeh’n eer red shoh , dy der eshyn ta er chur obbyr vie er y hoshiaght ny-vud eu , mullagh er derrey laa Yeesey Creest :

As ta fys ain dy vel Mac Yee er jeet , as er choyrt dooin tushtey , dy vod mayd enney y choyrt ersyn ta firrinagh : as ta shin aynsyn ta firrinagh , dy jarroo ayns e Vac Yeesey Creest . Shoh yn Jee firrinagh , as yn vea dy bragh farraghtyn .
My oddys eh ve , wheesh as t’ayns nyn booar , jean-jee baghey ayns shee rish dy chooilley ghooinney .
Lhig dooin cummal shickyr goaill rish nyn gredjue fegooish scughey ; ( son t’eshyn firrinagh ta er ghialdyn : )
Shee ta mee dy aagail mêriu , my hee ta mee dy choyrt diu : cha nee myr ta’n seihll coyrt , ta mish dy choyrt eh diu . Ny lhig da’n cree eu ve seaghnit , chamoo lhig da aggle y ve er .
Myr shen ta shin dy kinjagh ayns cree , toiggal choud as ta shin ec y thie ayns y chorp , ta shin mooie veih’n Chiarn :
As my ta dooinney erbee ta clashtyn , as nagh vel freayll my ghoan , cha vel mish dy vriwnys eh : son cha daink mee dy vriwnys y seihll , agh dy hauail y seihll .
Cha nee myr va Cain , va jeh’n drogh-er shen , as varr e vraar : As cre’n-fa varr eh eh ? Er-yn-oyr dy row ny obbraghyn echey hene olk , as obbraghyn e vraarey cairagh .
As ren dy chooilley ellan chea ersooyl , as cha row ny sleityn ry-gheddyn .
Shen-y-fa hrog jeh un ayr , as eshyn chammah as marroo , whilleen as rollageyn yn aer ayns earroo , as myr y gheinnagh rish oirr ny marrey erskyn coontey .
Nish gys y Ree dy bragh beayn , va er-dy-rieau , nagh vod ve er ny akin , gys yn ynrycan Jee creeney , dy row ooashley as gloyr , son dy bragh as dy bragh . Amen .
Gra lesh ard-choraa , Gow-jee aggle roish Jee , as cur-jee gloyr da ; son ta oor y vriwnys echey er jeet : as cur-jee ooashley dasyn chroo niau as thalloo , as yn aarkey , as ny farraneyn ushtey .
As ayns ny laghyn shen tra va earroo ny credjuee er nyn mishaghey , hug ny Grecianee stiagh plaiynt noi ny Hebrewyn , son dy row ny mraane-treoghe oc faagit magh gyn ayrn jeh’n ghiastyllys gaghlaa .
Son gys shoh va shiu dy jarroo er nyn eam : er-yn-oyr dy vel Creest myrgeddin er hurranse er nyn son , faagail sampleyr dooinyn , dy jinnagh shin geiyrt er ny kesmadyn echeysyn :
Son dy jarroo tra va shin mêriu , hug shin yn sarey shoh diu , Fer erbee nagh jinnagh gobbraghey , nagh lhisagh eh gee .
Son lheid y ghraih shen hug Jee da’n theihll , dy dug eh e ynrycan Vac v’er ny gheddyn , nagh jinnagh quoi-erbee chredjagh aynsyn cherraghtyn , agh yn vea ta dy bragh farraghtyn y chosney .
As dreggyr y drogh-spyrryd as dooyrt eh , Yeesey shione dou , as ta enney aym er Paul ; agh quoi shiuish ?
As honnick mee yn veisht as reeaghyn y theihll , er nyn jaglym cooidjagh dy chaggey noi-syn va markiagh er y chabbyl , as noi e heshaght-chaggee .
As goll er-board lhong veih Adramyttium , hie shin magh son y cheayn , kiarail shiaulley rish coastyn Asia , as va Aristarchus , Macedonian veih Thessalonica mârin .
Cooinee-jee orroosyn t’ayns geulaghyn , myr ayns geulaghyn mâroo ; as orroosyn t’ayns seaghyn , myr ta shin hene myrgeddin ’sy challin .
As cre-erbee ta shiu gra ny jannoo , jean-jee ooilley ayns ennym y Chiarn Yeesey , coyrt booise da Jee dy jarroo yn Ayr ny hrooidsyn .
Lhig dasyn t’er ny ynsaghey ayns y goo , shirveish ersyn ta gynsaghey jeh dy chooilley nhee mie [ t’echey ] .
As cha dug eh eiraght erbee da ayn , wheesh as lheead trie : foast ghiall eh dy jinnagh eh da eh son eiraght , as da e luight ny-yeï , tra v’eh foast gyn cloan .
Ghell eh shoh dy foalsey rish y chynney ain , as hug eh drogh-chorrym da nyn ayraghyn , myr shen dy row ad êginit nyn gloan veggey y hilgey magh , dy ve stroit .
Hie Peddyr er-y-fa shen magh , as yn ostyl elley shen , as haink ad gys yn oaie .
As er-yn-oyr shoh ta mee er my chliaghtey hene , dy reayll kinjagh cooinsheanse gyn loght gys Jee as gys deiney .
Tonnyn freaynagh yn aarkey , keshal magh yn nearey oc hene ; rollageyn rouail , daue ta kiarit yn dooid dy ghorraghys son dy bragh .
Son chamoo hooar mee eh voish dooinney , chamoo hie eh er ynsaghey dou , agh liorish ashlish Yeesey Creest .
Son tra va shin ayns yn eill , ren yeearreeyn peccoil va liorish y leigh , gobbraghey ayns nyn oltyn dy ymmyrkey magh mess gys baase .
Gys shoh va mee er my oardaghey ny phreachoor , as ostyl ( ta mee loayrt yn irriney ayns Creest , as cha vel mee ginsh breg ) fer-ynsee ny Ashoonee ayns credjue as firrinys .
As eshyn ta freayll ny annaghyn echey , t’eh tannaghtyn ayns Jee , as Jee aynsyn : as liorish shoh ta fys ain dy vel eh tannaghtyn aynin , liorish y Spyrryd t’eh er choyrt dooin .
Ny lhig da dooinney erbee shirrey ynrycan e vondeish hene : agh dy chooilley unnane foays e naboo .
Bee-jee jeh un aigney yn derrey yeh gys y jeh elley . Ny soie-jee nyn aigney er nheeghyn ard , agh croym-jee gys deiney ta injil ayns stayd . Ny bee-jee creeney ayns ny smooinaghtyn eu hene .
Lhig da dy chooilley roonid , as jymmoose , as farg , as beealleraght , as oltooan ve eebrit , veue , marish dy chooilley ghoanlys .
Jeh’n chooid cheddin , ta mish er my yannoo my hirveishagh cordail rish oardagh Yee , t’er ny choyrt dooys er y choontey euish , dy chooilleeney goo Yee ;
Va e chione as e olt bane myr ollan , cha gial as sniaghtey ; as va e hooillyn myr lossey dy aile ;
Son ta dy chooilley nhee er y ghraih euish , dy voddagh yn ghrayse feoilt , trooid toyrt-booise ymmodee , bishaghey gys gloyr Yee .
Eshyn ta gee my eill as giu my uill , t’eh baghey aynym’s , as mish aynsyn .
Dooyrt ee rish , Ta , Hiarn : ta mee credjal dy nee uss yn Creest Mac Yee , va ry-hoi cheet gys y theihll .
As ren ad tannaghtyn ayns ynsagh as sheshaght ny hostyllyn , as ayns brishey arran , as ayns padjeryn .
T’ou er choyrt graih da cairys , as feoh da mee-chairys ; shen-y-fa ta Jee , dy jarroo yn Jee ayd’s , er dty ooillaghey lesh yn ooil dy ghennallys erskyn dty heshaghyn .
As varr eh Jamys braar Ean lesh y chliwe .
Agh chea veih glare mee-chrauee as fardalagh ; son hed ad er nyn doshiaght gys mee-chraueeaght smoo .
Quoi-erbee ta dwoaie echey er e vraar , t’eh ny ghunver : as ta fys eu nagh vel ec dunver erbee yn vea dy bragh farraghtyn tannaghtyn ayn .

Myr shen tra v’ad erreish bee , dooyrt Yeesey rish Simon Peddyr , Simon mac Yonas , vel oo ny s’graihee orrym’s na orroo shoh ? Dooyrt eh rish , Ta mee , Hiarn ; ta fys ayd dy vel graih aym ort . Dooyrt eh rish , Jeeagh dy mie da my eayin .
Son da fer ta er ny choyrt liorish y Spyrryd , yn goo dy chreenaght ; da fer elley yn goo dy hushtey liorish y Spyrryd cheddin ;
As yn nah cheayrt ren Joseph eh-hene y hoilshaghey da e vraaraghyn ; as va kynney Yoseph er ny hoilshaghey da Pharaoh .
Son eshyn saillish ve graihagh er bea , as laghyn mie y akin , lhig da e hengey y smaghtaghey veih olk , as e veillyn nagh loayr ad veg y volteyraght .
As va’n earroo jeusyn ren credjal jeh’n un chree as yn un annym ; chamoo dooyrt fer jeu , dy by-lesh hene va nhee erbee jeh e chooid-seihlt , agh va dy chooilley nhee oc ayns co-pharteeys cadjin .
Son livrey mee diu hoshiaght ooilley , shen ny hooar mee hene myrgeddin , kys dy dooar Creest baase son nyn beccaghyn cordail rish ny scriptyryn :
As ayn-jee v’er ny gheddyn fuill phadeyryn , as nooghyn , as [ yn uill ] ocsyn ooilley v’er nyn ghunverys er y thalloo .
As tra cheayll ny Ashoonee shoh ghow ad boggey , as ren ad goo yn Chiarn y ghloyraghey : as whilleen as va feeu as aarloo son y vea veayn ren ad credjal .
T’eshyn ta gymmyrkey feanish gys ny reddyn shoh , gra , Dy firrinagh ta mee cheet dy tappee . Amen . Eer myr shoh , tar , Hiarn Yeesey .
Ny reddyn shen ta shiu chammah er n’ynsaghey as er n’ghoaill roo , as er chlashtyn , as er vakin aynym’s , jean-jee ad y chooilleeney : as bee Jee yn chee mêriu .
Ny-yeih ny jeeagh-jee er myr noid , agh coyrlee-jee eh myr braar .
Bee-jee er nyn dwoaie nagh gow dooinney erbee vondeish erriu trooid ynsagh foalsey as molteyraght , lurg cliaghtaghyn deiney , lurg ynsagh annoon y theihll , as cha nee lurg Creest :
Ta mee chionney gys y vark , son leagh yn eam hug Jee dou veih’n yrjid ayns Creest Yeesey .
Hug eh-hene er nyn son , dy voddagh eh shin y eaysley veih dy chooilley vee-chraueeaght , as casherickey da hene pobble reiht , jeean ayns obbraghyn mie .

Dy firrinagh firrinagh ta mee gra riu , Eshyn ta clashtyn my ghoo’s , as credjal aynsyn t’er my choyrt , ta’n vea ta dy bragh farraghtyn echey , as cha jig eh gys coayl-anmey : agh t’eh er gholl veih baase gys bea .
As va echeysyn va taggloo rhym lorg-towshan airhey , dy howse yn ard-valley , as ny giattyn eck , as y voalley eck .
Ta’n jerrey oc toyrt-mow , yn Jee oc ta nyn molg , as ta’n gloyr oc ayns nyn nearey , ta nyn aigney er nheeghyn seihltagh . )
Cha nee fer gerrit ’sy chredjue , er-aggle dy bee eh troggit seose lesh moyrn , as dy duitt eh fo briwnys y drogh-spyrryd .

Chaarjyn , tra va mish ayns lane imnea dy scrieu hiuish mychione y taualtys cadjin , ve ymmyrchagh dooys dy scrieu hiu , as dy choyrlaghey shiu dy jeean dy hassoo seose son y chredjue va un cheayrt er ny livrey da ny nooghyn .
As ayns jiarg-chorree roo son dy row ad gynsaghey yn pobble , as preacheil trooid Yeesey yn irree-seose-reesht veih ny merriu .
Son ta e peccaghyn , er roshtyn gys niau , as ta Jee er chooinnaghtyn er y vee-chairys eck .
Myr shen haink Yeesey reesht gys Cana ayns Galilee , raad v’eh er hyndaa yn ushtey gys feeyn . As va chiarn dy row , va’n mac echey ching ec Capernaum .
Cha nee liastey ayns obbyr ; agh jeean ayns spyrryd ; shirveish y Chiarn :
Ersyn ta shiu graihagh , ga nagh vel shiu er vakin eh ; ayn , ga nagh vel shiu nish fakin eh , ny-yeih credjal , ta shiu goaill boggey lesh boggey erskyn insh , as lane dy ghloyr :
Liorish shoh ta fys ain dy vel shin tannaghtyn aynsyn , as eshyn aynin , er-yn-oyr dy vel eh er choyrt dooinyn jeh’n Spyrryd echey .
Nish va saagh er ny hoiaghey lane vinegar : as lhieen ad spunge lesh y vinegar , as hug ad eh er hyssop , as heeyn ad eh seose gys e veeal .
Ta er livrey shin veih pooar y dorraghys , as er hoiaghey shin ayns reeriaght e Vac graihagh hene :
Nish ta mee guee erriu , vraaraghyn , gow-jee tastey jeusyn ta kyndagh jeh anvea as scammyltyn , ta noi’n chredjue ta shiuish er n’ynsaghey ; as chea-jee voue .
Ny shirveish , lhig dooin tastey y choyrt da’n chirveish ain ; ny eshyn ta gynsaghey , da ynsagh ;
As ayns y laa shen cha jean shiu nhee erbee y ênaght jeem’s : Dy firrinagh firrinagh ta mee gra riu , Cre-erbee hirrys shiu er yn Ayr ayns yn ennym aym’s , ver eh diu eh .

As va undinyn voalley’n ard-valley soit magh dy stooamey lesh dy chooilley horch dy chlaghyn costal . Va’n chied undin dy Yasper ; va’n nah undin , dy Sapphire ; va’n trass dy Chalcedony ; as va’n chiarroo , dy Emerald ;
Shen-y-fa eshyn ta fys echey dy yannoo mie , as nagh vel dy yannoo eh , dasyn te peccah .
As haink coraa magh veih’n stoyl-reeoil , gra , Cur-jee moylley da’n Jee ain , ooilley shiuish e harvaantyn , as shiuish ta goaill aggle roish , chammah beg as mooar .
Son ayns shoh ta shin osnaghey dy trome , geearree dy ve coamrit lesh nyn dhie ta veih niau :
Agh lhig da dy chooilley ghooinney e obbyr hene y phrowal , as eisht vees echey oyr boggey ayn hene ny-lomarcan , as cha nee ayns fer elley .

Agh my ta dooinney erbee smooinaghtyn dy vel eh dy ymmyrkey eh-hene dy neu-yesh gys e voidyn , my t’ee er n’gholl harrish blaa yn eash eck , as eh ymmyrchagh myr shen dy ve , lhig da ’aigney y yannoo , cha vel eh jannoo peccah : lhig daue poosey .
Ver ad shiu magh ass ny kialteenyn : as ta’n oor cheet , quoi-erbee varrys shiu , dy smooinee eh dy bee eh shirveish Jee .
As honnick mee cowrey elley ayns niau , mooar as mirrilagh , shiaght ainleyn as ny shiaght briwnyssyn s’jerree oc , son ayndoosyn t’er ny lhieeney seose jymmoose Yee .
Dansoor Yeesey eh , My ta mee er loayrt dy olk , ymmyrk feanish jeh’n olk : agh my loayr mee dy mie , cre’n-fa woaill uss mee ?

As ta mee guee ort’s myrgeddin , cho-obbree firrinagh , cooin lesh ny mraane shen ren m’y hirveish ayns y sushtal , marish Clement myrgeddin , as y chooid elley jeh my cho-labreeyn , ny enmyn oc ta ayns lioar y vea .
Son t’ad er gheayrtey fuill nooghyn as phadeyryn , as t’ou er choyrt daue fuill dy iu ; son shen t’ad dy hoilliu .
Ny lhig eh Jee : kys oddys shinyn ta marroo gys peccah , baghey ny-sodjey ain ?
As y veisht va , as nagh vel , t’eh shoh dy jarroo yn hoghtoo , as t’eh jeh’n chiaght , as goll dys toyrt-mow .
Ny-yeih , cre ta’n scriptyr dy ghra ? Tilg magh yn inney-veyl as y mac eck : son cha bee mac yn inney-veyl ny eirey marish mac y ven-seyr .
Agh t’adsyn ta soit er ve berchagh tuittym ayns miolagh , as ribbey , as ayns ymmodee sayntyn olk as ommijagh , ta baih deiney ayns toyrt-mow as coayl-anmey .
As ver ny jeih eairkyn honnick oo er y veisht , dwoaie da’n streebagh , as ver ad mow ee , as rooishtee ad ee , as nee ad gee yn eill eck , as loshtee ad ee lesh aile .
Agh my ta dooinney erbee graihagh er Jee , ta’n fer cheddin er ny ghoaill rish liorishyn .
Cre eisht ? vel shinyn ny share na adsyn ? Cha vel er aght erbee : son ta shin roïe er phrowal dy vel chammah Ewnyn as Ashoonee , ooilley fo peccah ;
As ren ad co-chaslys lheiy ayns ny laghyn shen , as heb ad oural da’n jalloo , as ghow ad boggey ayns obbraghyn ny laueyn oc hene .

As y chooid elley jeh ny deiney nagh row er nyn stroie liorish ny kerraghyn agglagh shoh , cha ghow ad foast arrys son obbraghyn nyn laueyn , ayns gyn coyrt ooashley da jouyil , as jallooyn dy airh , dy argid , as prash , as clagh , as fuygh : nagh vod fakin , ny clashtyn , ny shooyl :

Toiggal er-y-fa shen atchim y Chiarn , ta shin coyrlaghey deiney ; agh ta’n ynrickys ainyn er ny hoilshaghey gys Jee , as ta mee treishteil neesht , dy vel eh er ny hoilshaghey gys ny cooinsheanseyn euish .

Ayndoo shoh ren shin ooilley myrgeddin baghey roish nish , ayns sayntyn ny foalley , cooilleeney yeearreeyn yn eill , as yn aigney : as va shin liorish dooghys nyn gloan dy yymmoose , dy jarroo myr feallagh elley .
As lesh ymmodee goan elley dymmyrk eh feanish as choyrlee eh , gra , Saue-jee shiu hene veih’n cheeloghe roonagh shoh .
Son my ta shiu baghey lurg yn eill , yiow shiu baase : agh my ta shiu trooid y Spyrryd cur naardey obbraghyn y challin , bee shiu bio .
Son ta’n scriptyr gra , Quoi-erbee ta credjal ersyn , nagh bee eh er ny choyrt gys nearey .
Hoshiaght , ta mee coyrt booise da my Yee trooid Yeesey Creest er nyn son eu ooilley , dy vel y credjue euish er ny imraa jeh trooid y slane seihll .
Toiggal , chaarjyn ghraihagh , dy vel shiu reiht liorish Jee .
As erskyn dy chooilley nhee lhig da graih jeean ve eu dy cheilley : son nee graih coodaghey ymmodee peccaghyn .
As tra ve kiarit dy row shin dy ghoaill lhuingys gys Italy , livrey ad Paul as shiartanse dy phryssoonee elley , gys fer va enmyssit Julius centurion v’ayns sheshaght-chaggee Augustus .
As ghow ad arrane Voses sharvaant Yee , as arrane yn Eayn , gra , Mooar as mirrilagh ta dty obbraghyn , Hiarn Yee Ooilley-niartal ; cairagh as firrinagh ta dty raaidyn , uss Ree nooghyn .
Myr oikanyn noa-ruggit yeearree-jee bainney spyrrydoil y ghoo , dy vod shiu gaase liorish :

As cheayll mee coraa veih niau , gra rhym , Scrieu , Veih shoh magh , bannit ta ny merriu ta geddyn baase ayns y Chiarn : Dy jarroo myr shen ta’n Spyrryd dy ghra , son t’ad ec fea veih nyn seaghyn ; as ta nyn obbraghyn geiyrt daue .

Craueeaght firrinagh as glen kiongoyrt rish Jee , dy jarroo yn Ayr , shoh eh , Dy ghoaill kiarail jeh cloan gyn ayr as mraane-treoghe ayns nyn seaghyn , as dy reayll eh hene glen veih broïd y theihll .
As shoh ta mee dy ghra , er-aggle dy jinnagh dooinney erbee shiuish y volley lesh goan brynnagh .

As dy chooilley chretoor t’ayns niau , as er y thalloo , as fo’n thalloo , as lheid as ta ayns y cheayn , as ooilley ny t’ayndoo , cheayll mee , gra , Bannaght , as ooashley , as gloyr , as pooar dy row huggeysyn ta soie er y stoyl-reeoil , as gys yn Eayn son dy bragh as dy bragh .
As heid yn nah ainle , as va myr dy beagh slieau mooar lostey lesh aile tilgit ’syn aarkey ; as haink y trass ayrn jeh’n aarkey dy ve fuill :
As hilg ad eh magh ass yn ard-valley , as chlagh ad eh : as hug ny feanishyn nyn eaddagh ny lhie ec cassyn dooinney aeg , va enmyssit Saul ,
As reesht , Moylley-jee yn Chiarn , ooilley shiuish Ashoonyn-quaagh , as cur-jee moylley da , ooilley shiuish phobble .
Son veihsyn , as ny hrooidsyn , as dasyn ta dy chooilley nhee : huggey dy row gloyr son dy bragh . Amen .
Yn nah laa honnick Ean Yeesey cheet ny-whail , as dooyrt eh , Cur-my-ner Eayn Yee , ta goaill ersooyl peccah yn theihll .
Liorish credjue ve , nagh ren yn ven-oast Rahab cherraghtyn mâroosyn nagh ren credjal , tra hug ee oltagh-bea da ny brialtee ayns shee .
Cha vel y maarliagh cheet agh dy gheid , as dy varroo as dy stroie : haink mish dy voddagh bea y ve oc , as dy voddagh eh y ve oc ayns mooarane palchey .
Son ta cairys cummaltee ain ayns niau , veih ta shin myrgeddin jeeaghyn son yn Saualtagh , yn Chiarn Yeesey Creest :
Shen-y-fa jean-jee soiaghey yn derrey yeh jeh’n jeh elley , myr ta Creest myrgeddin er n’yannoo soiagh j’in gys gloyr Yee .

Gow ad shoh , as bee er dty ghlenney as ec cost mâroo , dy vod ad nyn ghing y shaval : as dy vod fys y ve ec dy chooilley unnane , nagh vel nhee erbee ayns ny cheayll ad jeeds , agh dy vel oo hene freayll ny oardaghyn , ayns biallys da’n leigh .

As ayr jeh giarey-chymmylt dauesyn nagh vel jeh’n ghiarey-chymmylt ny-lomarcan , agh dauesyn myrgeddin ta gimmeeaght ayns kesmadyn y chredjue shen va ec yn ayr ain Abraham roish my row eh er ny ghiarey-chymmylt .
As hug ad magh nyn lottyn ; as huitt y lot er Matthias , as v’eh er ny earroo marish yn un ostyl yeig .
Gra , Bannit t’eshyn ta e neu-chairys er ny leih da , as e pheccah er ny choodaghey .
Ad shoh yn daa villey-olive , as y daa chainleyr shassoo kionfenish Jee yn theihll .
Bee-jee seaghnit , as jean-jee dobberan as keayney : lhig da’n gharaghtee eu ve chyndaait gys dobberan , as y reaïd eu gys trimshey .
Charrey , ny eiyr er yn olk , agh er shen ta mie . Eshyn ta jannoo mie , t’eh jeh Jee : agh eshyn ta jannoo olk , cha vel eh er vakin Jee .

As hooar eh yn cowrey dy ghiarey-chymmylt , myr seal jeh cairys y chredjue va echey roish hie giarey-chymmylt er ; dy voddagh eh ve yn ayr ocsyn ooilley ta credjal , ga nagh vel ad er nyn ghiarey-chymmylt ; dy voddagh cairys ve er ny choyrt gys y lieh ocsyn myrgeddin :
Son eshyn ta marroo , t’eh seyr veih peccah .
Dy kinjagh gymmyrkey mygeayrt-y-mooin ayns y chorp , baase y Chiarn Yeesey , dy voddagh bioys Yeesey ve myrgeddin jeant cronnal ayns y chorp ainyn .
Son ta ooilley er nyn son hene , cha nee son ny reddyn ta bentyn rish Yeesey Creest .
Trooid credjue hooar Sara ee-hene niart dy ghientyn , as ren ee lhiannoo y ymmyrkey lurg y traa cooie , er-yn-oyr dy row ee jeeaghyn ersyn dy ve firrinagh va er ghialdyn .
As shoh aigney yn Ayr ta er my choyrt , jeh ooilley ny hug eh dou nagh gaillin veg , agh dy droggin eh seose reesht ec y laa jerrinagh .
Agh dooinyn cha vel ayn agh un Jee , yn Ayr , jehsyn ta dy chooilley nhee , as shinyn aynsyn ; as un Chiarn Yeesey Creest , liorishyn ta dy chooilley nhee , as shinyn liorishyn .

Agh nish tra haink Timotheus veueish hooinyn , as er chur lesh mârish coontey mie jeh’n chredjue as y ghraih eu , as dy vel shiu kinjagh gimraa dy dooie orrin , geearree dy jeean dy akin shinyn , myr ta shinyn myrgeddin dy akin shiuish :
As tra hig yn Ard-vochilley kionfenish , yiow shiu attey dy ghloyr nagh jean fioghey ersooyl .
Fakin eisht dy vel ain lheid y treishteil , ta shin goaill orrin dy loayrt lesh slane reamys .

Agh ad shoh , myr beïyn feïe gyn resoon dooghyssagh , jeant dy ve shelgit as stroit , t’ad loayrt dy olk jeh ny reddyn nagh vel ad toiggal , as nee ad cherraghtyn dy bollagh ayns y neu-ghlennid oc hene :
Shoh dooyrt eh , cha nee ayns kiarail erbee son ny boghtyn , agh dy row eh ny vaarliagh , er va currym y sporran , as eshyn va gymmyrkey ny v’ayn .
As ta shin er hoiggal as er chredjal yn ghraih t’ec Jee dooinyn . Ta Jee graih ; as eshyn ta tannaghtyn ayns graih , t’eh tannaghtyn ayns Jee , as Jee aynsyn .

Nish va’n vooinjer v’er nyn skeayley magh , kyndagh rish y tranlaase va jeant er coontey Steaon er droailt choud as Phenice , as Cyprus , as Antioch , as cha ren ad yn goo y phreacheil da unnane erbee agh ynrycan da ny Hewnyn .
Agh ta craueeaght lesh aigney booiagh cosney mooar .
As va pooar er ny choyrt da dy chaggey noi ny nooghyn , as dy gheddyn yn varriaght orroo : as va pooar er ny choyrt da harrish dy chooilley chynney , as glare , as ashoon .

Son cre’n moylley te , tra ta shiu er nyn mwoalley son ny foiljyn eu , shiu dy ghoaill eh dy meen ? agh tra ta shiu jannoo dy mie , as surranse er y hon , my nee shiu goaill eh dy meen ; ta shoh booisal gys Jee .

As son yn oyr shoh she eshyn ta eddyr shin as Jee fo’n conaant noa , myr shen liorish fuilliaghtyn baase dy yannoo lhiassaghey son ny peccaghyn va fo’n chied chonaant , dy voddagh adsyn t’er nyn eam geddyn yn gialdynys jeh eiraght dy bragh farraghtyn .
Cre jir mayd eisht ? jean mayd tannaghtyn ayns peccah , dy vod grayse bishaghey ?
Chamoo broïd , ny glare ommijagh , ny craid , nagh vel jesh ; agh ayns ynnyd oc shoh coyrt booise .

As yeeagh mee , cur-my-ner , cabbyl banee ; as va ennym yn varkiaght v’er , yn Baase , as yn oaie geiyrt er : as va pooar currit daue harrish y chiarroo ayrn jeh’n thalloo , dy varroo lesh y chliwe , as lesh gortey , as lesh baase , as lesh beïyn feïe y thallooin .

Shen-y-fa te jeh credjue , dy voddagh eh ve jeh foayr ; dy voddagh y gialdyn ve shickyr da ooilley’n sluight , cha nee dauesyn ny-lomarcan ta fo’n leigh , agh dauesyn myrgeddin ta jeh credjue Abraham , ta’n ayr ain ooilley ,
As tra v’ad shoh er vriwnys my chooish , v’ad booiagh yn raad y lhiggey dou , er-y-fa nagh row oyr erbee baaish aynym .
Myr shen eisht cha vel eh jehsyn ta aignagh , ny jehsyn ta roie , agh jeh Jee ta soilshaghey myghin .
Chamoo lhig dooin cur rish maarderys , myr ren paart jeusyn , as huitt ad ayns un laa three thousaneyn as feed .
Agh ta mee gennaghtyn leigh elley ayns my oltyn , caggey noi leigh my aigney , as dy my hayrn fo bondiaght gys y leigh dy pheccah , t’ayns my oltyn .

Shen-y-fa faagail ny chied vanglaneyn jeh ynsagh Chreest , lhig dooin goll er nyn doshiaght gys slane creestiaght , cha nee soiaghey reesht yn undin dy arrys veih obbraghyn marroo , as jeh credjue gys Jee ,
Ny lhig da dooinney erbee er-y-fa shen beg y hoiaghey jeh , agh cur-jee eh er e hoshiaght ayns shee , dy vod eh cheet hym’s : son ta mee jeeaghyn er e hon marish ny braaraghyn .
Cre sheeagh eh , my vraaraghyn , da dooinney dy ghra dy vel credjue echey , as nagh vel obbraghyn echey ? vod credjue y hauail eh ?
Eisht dooyrt paart jeusyn va veih Jerusalem , Nagh nee shoh eh t’ad shirrey dy varroo ?
As tra v’eh er ghra shoh , heid eh orroo , as dooyrt eh roo , Gow-jee yn Spyrryd Noo .
Son mee-hushtagh jeh cairys Yee , as shirrey dy hoiaghey seose yn chairys oc hene , cha vel ad er injillaghey ad-hene gys cairys Yee .

Eshyn ta credjal ayns Mac Yee , ta’n feanish echey ayn hene : eshyn nagh vel credjal Jee , t’eh er n’yannoo eh ny vreagerey ; er-yn-oyr nagh vel eh credjal yn recortys ta Jee er n’ymmyrkey jeh e Vac .

Dy firrinagh firrinagh ta mee gra riu , Eshyn ta credjal aynym’s , ny obbraghyn ta mish dy yannoo nee eshyn myrgeddin , as obbraghyn smoo na ad shoh nee eh ; er-y-fa dy vel mish goll roym gys my Ayr .
Coyrlee sharvaantyn dy ve biallagh da nyn mainshteryn hene , as dy wooiys ad dy mie ayns dy chooilley nhee ; cha nee perkinnagh ,
Jeeaghyn dy imneagh , nagh duitt dooinney erbee giare jeh grayse Yee ; er-aggle dy jean fraue erbee dy herriuid gaase seose , shiu y voirey , as ymmodee liorish shen er nyn byshooney :
Shegin da myrgeddin goo mie ve echey vouesyn ta mooie ; er-aggle dy duitt eh fo scammylt , as ribbey yn drogh-spyrryd .
Agh da dagh unnane ain ta grayse er ny choyrt , cordail rish towse gioot Chreest .
As ren y nah ainle e chappan y gheayrtey er yn aarkey ; as haink eh dy ve myr fuill dooinney marroo : as hooar dy chooilley chretoor bio baase ’syn aarkey .
Cha nee lesh shirveish-sooilley , myr dy wooiys deiney , agh myr sharvaantyn Chreest , jannoo aigney Yee veih nyn gree ;
Freayll cooinsheanse vie ; son wheesh as dy vel ad goltooaney shiuish myr drogh-yantee , dy vod ad nearey ’ghoaill ta cassid dy foalsey yn ymmyrkey-bea vie eu ayns Creest .
As shoh yn aigney echeysyn ta er my choyrt , dy chooilley unnane ta fakin y Mac as credjal ayn , yn vea dy bragh farraghtyn dy ve echey : as trog-yms seose eh ec y laa jerrinagh .
As chelleeragh woaill ainle y Chiarn eh , er-yn-oyr nagh dug eh yn gloyr da Jee : as v’eh eeit ec ny crooagyn , as shen myr hooar eh baase .
Bannit dy row Jee , eer Ayr nyn Jiarn Yeesey Creest , yn Ayr dy vyghinyn , as Jee dy chooilley gherjagh ;
Veih ta paart er n’gholl er-shaghryn , as er hyndaa gy-lhiattee gys argane fardalagh ;
Son cha vel nearey orrym jeh sushtal Chreest : son te pooar Yee gys saualtys , da dy chooilley unnane ta credjal , da’n Ew hoshiaght , as myrgeddin da’n Greek .
Son undin elley cha vod dooinney erbee y hoiaghey , agh shen ny ta er ny hoiaghey , ta shen Creest Yeesey .
Ny-yeih , lhig da dagh unnane euish er-lheh myr shen graih y choyrt da e ven dy jarroo myr da hene ; as jeeagh dy der y ven arrym da e sheshey .
As shiuish va marroo ayns nyn beccaghyn , as ayns yn an-ghiarey-chymmylt yn eill eu , t’eshyn er vioghey cooidjagh mârishyn , erreish da v’er leih diu ooilley nyn loghtyn ,
Ny bee mee-rioosagh jeh’n ghioot t’aynyd , va er ny chur dhyt liorish phadeyrys , tra hie oo fo laueyn ny shirveishee casherick .
As honnick mee niau noa as seihll noa : son va’n chied niau as y chied seihll er n’gholl shaghey ; as cha row faarkey ayn arragh .
Gow-jee dy bragh boggey .
As ayns ny laghyn shen , nee deiney shirrey baase , as cha vow ad eh ; as bee ad aignagh baase y gheddyn , as nee’n baase chea voue .
Son my ta shin credjal dy dooar Yeesey baase , as dy dirree eh reesht , dy jarroo myr shen adsyn myrgeddin ta cadley ayns Yeesey , ver Jee lesh mârish .
Quoi-erbee nee goaill-rish dy nee Yeesey Mac Yee , ta Jee tannaghtyn aynsyn , as eshyn ayns Jee .
Mychione yn ymmyrkey-bea eu t’er n’gholl shaghey , dy der shiu jeh yn chenn ghooinney , ta neu-ghlen cordail rish yeearreeyn molteyragh ny foalley .
Mish y dorrys : liorym’s my ta dooinney erbee goll stiagh , bee eh er ny hauail , as hed eh stiagh as magh , as yiow eh fassaghey .

V’ad er nyn glaghey , v’ad giarit veih-my-cheilley lesh saaueyn , v’ad miolit , v’ad er nyn goyrt dy baase lesh y chliwe : hie ad noon as noal ayns craitnyn keyrragh , as craitnyn goair , ayns êgin , ayns seaghyn , as torchaghyn :
My ta fys eu dy vel eshyn cairagh , ta fys eu dy vel dy chooilley unnane ta cur rish cairys , er ny ruggey jehsyn .
Son shen myr ta’n Chiarn er chur sarey dooin , gra , Ta mee er hoiaghey oo seose dy ve dty hoilshey da ny Ashoonee , as dy ve son saualtys gys ardjyn sodjey magh y thallooin .

Agh ta shin er choyrt slane obbal da ny cliaghtaghyn follit scammyltagh , cha nee gimmeeaght ayns molteyrys , chamoo shirveish goo Yee dy foalsey , agh liorish soilshaghey magh yn irriney , faagail shin hene gys [ briwnys ] cooinsheanse dy chooilley ghooinney ayns fenish Yee .
Shen-y-fa myr t’eh er ny ghoaill seose liorish laue-yesh Yee , as er gheddyn veih yn Ayr gialdyn yn Spyrryd Noo , t’eh er gheayrtey magh shoh ta shiuish nish fakin as clashtyn .
As dy vel shiu er chur erriu yn dooinney noa , ta er ny yannoo ass-y-noa ayns tushtey , lurg y co-chaslys echeysyn ren eshyn y chroo .
Tra cheayll Yeesey shoh , dooyrt eh , Cha vel y chingys shoh gys baase , agh son gloyr Yee , dy vod Mac Yee v’er ny ghloyraghey liorish .
Son ayns shen ta firrinys Yee er ny hoilshaghey veih credjue gys credjue : myr te scruit , Bee’n fer cairagh bio liorish credjue .
As dymmyrk eh e chrosh , as hie eh magh gys ynnyd yiarragh ad ynnyd y vollag rish , ta enmyssit ayns Hebrew , Golgotha .
Fakin eisht dy vel ain caghlaa dy ghiootyn cordail rish y ghrayse t’er ny choyrt dooin , edyr y ve son phadeyrys , lhig dooin jannoo phadeyrys cordail rish y corrymid dy chredjue :
As va’n chied chretoor casley rish lion , as va’n nah chretoor goll-rish lheiy , as va eddin ec y trass chretoor goll-rish dooinney , as va’n chiarroo chretoor myr urley ta getlagh .
Jeeagh-jee eisht dy jean shiu gimmeeaght dy tastagh , cha nee myr ommydanyn , agh myr sleih creeney ,
Son cha vel veg y soiagh eddyr yn Hew as y Greek ; son ta’n Chiarn cheddin harrish ooilley , berchagh dauesyn ooilley ta geamagh er .
Son ta Creest jerrey yn leigh son cairys , da dy chooilley unnane ta credjal .
Ny bee-jee imneagh son nhee erbee : agh ayns dy chooilley nhee liorish padjer as accan lesh toyrt-booise , lhig da ny aghinyn eu ve soilshit da Jee .
Nish va ny reddyn shoh son sampleyryn dooinyn , son nagh jinnagh shin saynt da nheeghyn olk , myr hug adsyn neesht saynt .
As doshil eh yn diunid gyn-grunt , as dirree jaagh ass y diunid myr jaagh coirrey ; as va’n ghrian as yn aer ayns dorraghys , kyndagh rish jaagh y diunid .

Nagh lhisagh dooinney erbee vondeish y ghoaill er e vraar as eh y voylley ayns cooish erbee : er-yn-oyr dy nee yn Chiarn ta goaill cooilleen er ooilley nyn lheid , myr ta shin er n’insh diu ro-laue , as er hoilshaghey .
Shen-y-fa my ta dooinney erbee ayns Creest , t’eh ny chretoor noa : ta shenn reddyn er n’gholl shaghey , cur-my-ner , ta dy chooilley nhee jeant ass y noa .
Son ta’n Ayr graihagh er y Mac , as t’eh soilshaghey da dy chooilley nhee t’eh hene dy yannoo : as soilshee eh da obbraghyn smoo na ad shoh , dy vod shiu yindys y ghoaill .
Lhig dasyn ren geid , gyn geid arragh ; agh ny sleaie lhig da laboragh , gobbraghey lesh e laueyn shen ny ta mie , dy vod ve echey dy choyrt da’n ymmyrchagh .
Agh marish shoh kiare aaght er my hon : son ta mee treishteil liorish ny padjeryn eu , trooid foayr Yee , dy jig-ym hiu reesht .

Ny bee-jee er nyn imman noon as noal lesh ymmodee ynsaghyn joarree : son te red mie dy bee’n cree er ny niartaghey lesh grayse , cha nee ayns y leigh mychione bee , nagh vel er ve vondeishagh dauesyn t’er chur tastey daue .
As ta shin guee erriu , vraaraghyn , dy choyrt geill dauesyn ta laboragh nyn mast’ eu , as ta harrystiu ayns y Chiarn , as coyrlaghey shiu ;

Ny goan shoh loayr e ayr as e voir , son dy row ad ayns aggle roish ny Hewnyn : son va ny Hewnyn er choardail hannah , my ghoghe dooinney erbee rish dy nee eh va’n Creest , dy beagh eh er ny ghiarey magh ass y synagogue .
Son ta shinyn yn giarey-chymmylt , ta cur ooashley da Jee ayns y spyrryd , as boggyssagh ayns Creest Yeesey , as cha vel shin coyrt barrant erbee gys yn eill :
As shoh yn sarey echey , Dy jean mayd credjal ayns ennym e Vac Yeesey Creest , as graih y choyrt yn derrey yeh da’n jeh elley , myr t’eh er choyrt sarey dooin .
As hug mee my-ner beisht elley troggal ass y thalloo , as va daa eairk echey goll-rish eayn , as loayr eh myr dragon .
Vraaraghyn , ny bee-jee nyn gloan ayns tushtey : ny-yeih ayns olkys bee-jee myr cloan , agh ayns toiggal bee-jee deiney .
Vel unnane erbee ny mast’ eu ayns seaghyn ? lhig da padjer y ghoaill . Vel fer erbee gennal ? lhig da arraneyn-moyllee ’ghoaill .
Shen-y-fa trog-jee seose ny laueyn gyn bree , as ny glioonyn annoon .
As my ta shiu genmys eshyn nyn Ayr , ta fegooish jannoo soiagh jeh persoonyn , briwnys cordail rish obbyr dy chooilley ghooinney , ceau-jee earish nyn droailtys ayns shoh ayns aggle :
Son te ymmyrchagh diu dy chummal rish dy surransagh ; lurg diu v’er n’yannoo aigney Yee , dy vod shiu yn gialdyn y gheddyn .
Nish ta credjue slane bree ny reddyn ta shin treishteil dy gheddyn , shickyrys reddyn nagh vel [ foast ] ry-akin .
Shoh ta mee gra eisht , as gymmyrkey feanish er lieh yn Chiarn , nagh jean shiu veih shoh magh gimmeeaght myr ta’n chooid elley jeh ny Ashoonyn-quaagh gimmeeaght ayns fardail nyn aignaghyn ;
Ny lhig da dooinney erbee er-y-fa shen shiuish y vriwnys mychione bee ny jough , ny mychione laa-feailley , ny mychione eayst-noa , ny mychione dooneeyn :
T’ad er-y-fa shen kiongoyrt rish stoyl-reeoil Yee , as dy hirveish eh oie as laa ayns e hiamble : as nee eshyn ta ny hoie er y stoyl-reeoil cummal nyn mast’ oc .
Agh hie Paul sheese , as gliooney liorish , as goaill eh ayns e roihaghyn , dooyrt eh , Ny bee-jee ayns imnea erbee ; son ta e vioys ayn .
Shen-y-fa ta mee surranse dy chooilley nhee er graih yn chloan reiht , dy vod adsyn neesht yn saualtys t’ayns Creest Yeesey y gheddyn , marish gloyr dy bragh beayn .
Oltee-jee y cheilley lesh paag dy ghraih [ creestee ] . Shee dy row mêriu ooilley t’ayns Creest Yeesey . Amen .
Ginjillaghey shiu hene yn derrey yeh gys y jeh elley ayns aggle Yee .

Fakin er-y-fa shen , chaarjyn , dy vel fys eu er ny reddyn shoh ro-laue , cur-jee twoaie nagh jean shiuish myrgeddin , cleaynit lesh shaghrynys ny mee-chrauee , tuittym ersooyl veih’n shickyrys eu ’sy chredjue .
Shiuish vraane-poost , jean-jee shiu hene y injillaghey gys ny deiney-poost eu hene , myr te cooie ayns y Chiarn .
Cur oghsan dauesyn ta cur rish peccah kiongoyrt rish ooilley , dy vod feallagh elley myrgeddin aggle y ghoaill .
Ny lhig dooin er-y-fa shen briwnys y cheilley ny sodjey : agh kiarail y ghoaill , nagh der dooinney erbee ribbey , ny oyr tuittym ayns raad e vraar .
Agh gloyr , ooashley , as shee , da dy chooilley ghooinney ta gobbraghey mie , da’n Ew hoshiaght , as myrgeddin da’n Ashoonagh .
Ren niart yn aile y vooghey , scape ad foyr y chliwe , ayns annooinid v’ad er nyn niartaghey , daase ad dunnal ayns caggey , hug er sheshaghtyn-caggee ny joarreeyn dy roie er-chea .
Maghey shoh ny lhig da dooinney erbee mish y voirey , son ta mee gymmyrkey ayns my chorp cowraghyn y Chiarn Yeesey .

As hrog ainle niartal clagh casley rish clagh vooar wyllin , as cheau eh eh ’sy cheayn , gra , Er yn aght shoh lesh niart breeoil vees yn ard-valley mooar shen Babylon er ny hilgey sheese , as cha bee ee arragh ry-gheddyn .
Agh shiuish , chaarjyn , troggal shiu hene er [ undin ] nyn gredjue smoo casherick , goaill padjer ayns y Spyrryd Noo ,

As ny jean-jee shiu hene y chummey gys y theihll shoh ; agh bee-jee er nyn gaghlaa ayns y cummey noa jeh nyn aigney , dy vod shiu prowal cre ta’n aigney shen dy Yee ta mie as booisal da , as dy slane casherick .
Son she mish y fer sloo jeh ny ostyllyn , nagh vel feeu dy ve er my enmys my ostyl , er-y-fa dy ren mee tranlaase er agglish Yee .
Ny cur-jee graih da’n seihll , ny da nheeghyn y theihll . My ta dooinney erbee cur graih da’n seihll , cha vel graih yn Ayr aynsyn .
Shen-y-fa t’ou fegooish leshtal , O ghooinney , quoi-erbee oo hene ta briwnys : son ayns ny t’ou briwnys fer elley , t’ou deyrey oo hene ; son uss ta briwnys , t’ou jannoo ny reddyn cheddin .

As tra hug Jamys , Cephas , as Ean , va goit son pillaryn , tastey da’n ghrayse v’er ny stowal orrym’s , hug ad dooys as da Barnabas yn laue yesh dy choardail ; dy ragh shinyn gys ny Ashoonee , as adsyn gys yn giarey-chymmylt .

Eisht ghow ny sidooryn , tra v’ad er chrossey Yeesey , e gharmadyn ( as ren ad kiare ayrnyn jeu , ayrn da dy chooilley hidoor ) as myrgeddin e chooat : nish va’n cooat ooilley feeit , veih heose dy heese , fegooish seam .
Uss er-y-fa shen ta gynsaghey fer elley , nagh vel oo gynsaghey oo hene ? uss ta preacheil nagh lhisagh dooinney geid , Vel oo hene geid ?
Cre , nagh vel fys eu dy vel y corp eu chiamble y Spyrryd Noo ta ayndiu , ta eu veih Jee , as cha vel shiu lhieu hene ?
Son ta graih Chreest dy êginaghey shin , er-y-fa dy nee myr shoh ta shin briwnys , my hooar un er baase son ooilley , eisht dy row ooilley marroo [ ayns peccah : ]
Shen-y-fa , vraaraghyn chrauee , paarteeassyn ’syn eam flaunyssagh , cur-jee tastey mie da Yeesey Creest , ostyl as ard-saggyrt nyn gredjue :

Ta mee er hoilshaghey diu dy chooilley nhee , kys laboraght myr shen , dy lhisagh shiu kemmyrk y choyrt da ny annooinee ; as cooinaghtyn er goan y Chiarn Yeesey , kys dooyrt eh , Te ny s’bannee dy choyrt na dy ghoaill .
Ta poosey onnoroil ayns ooilley , as y lhiabbee gyn-loght : agh maarderee as adsyn ta brishey-poosey nee Jee briwnys .
As chroym eh sheese , as honnick eh ny aanrityn nyn lhie , ny-yeih cha jagh eh stiagh .
As va coraaghyn , as taarnaghyn , as tendreilyn ; as va craa mooar thallooin , lheid as nagh row rieau neayr’s va sheelnaue er ny chroo , lheid y chraa-thallooin mooar as atchimagh .

As huitt mee ec e chassyn dy choyrt ooashley da : As dooyrt eh rhym , Jeeagh nagh jean oo eh : Ta mish dty heshey harvaant , as jeh dty vraaraghyn ta feanish Yeesey oc : cur ooashley da Jee : son ta feanish Yeesey yn spyrryd dy adeyrys .
Agh ta Jee er hoilshaghey ad dooinyn liorish e Spyrryd : son ta’n Spyrryd ronsaghey dy chooilley nhee , eer folliaghtyn dowiney Yee .
Gow-jee rish er-y-fa shen ayns y Chiarn lesh slane gennallys , as jeh nyn lheid jean-jee mooar y hoiaghey :
Chloan , cur-jee biallys da nyn ayr as nyn moir ayns dy chooilley nhee : son ta shoh booisal da’n Chiarn .

Son shoh nyn moggey , feanish nyn gooinsheanse , ayns ônid , as ynrickys crauee , cha nee lesh creenaght seihltagh , agh liorish grayse Yee , dy vel shin er n’ymmyrkey shin hene ’sy theihll , as foddey smoo ny mast’ euish .
Eshyn ta my annaghyn’s echey , as ta freayll ad , eshyn eh ta graihagh orrym’s : as eshyn ta graihagh orrym , ver my Ayr graih da , as ver-yms graih da , as soilshee-ym mee hene da .

Ayns ny reddyn cheddin ta dy jarroo caslys dy chreenaght ayns ooashley fardalagh , as injillid-aigney foalsey , as ayns goaill kerraghey er y chorp , cha nee gys moylley erbee dy chooilleeney yeearreeyn yn eill .
T’er n’ymmyrkey feanish jeh dty ghiastyllys kiongoyrt rish yn agglish : ad my ver oo er nyn doshiaght er nyn yurnah lurg aght creestee , nee oo dy mie :
Agh questionyn ommijagh as giare-cheeayllagh cur voïd , myr ta fys ayd dy vel ad doostey streeu .
Agh shinyn ooilley lesh eddin foshlit , cur-my-ner myr ayns gless gloyr y Chiarn , ta shin er nyn gaghlaa gys y chaslys cheddin , veih gloyr gys gloyr , myr liorish Spyrryd y Chiarn .
Cre-woad smoo nee fuill Chreest , ren eh-hene y oural gyn foill gys Jee trooid y Spyrryd dy bragh beayn , yn chooinsheanse euish y ghlenney veih obbraghyn marroo dy hirveish y Jee bio ?
Son wheesh eisht as dy row Jee er choyrt dauesyn yn un ghioot hug eh dooinyn v’er chredjal ayns y Chiarn Yeesey Creest , quoi va mish , dy shassin magh noï Jee ?
As ny cur-jee corree er Spyrryd casherick Yee , liorish ta shiu cowrit gys laa yn livrey-ys eu .

Cooinee , er-y-fa shen , kys t’ou er gheddyn as er chlashtyn , as cum shickyr , as gow arrys . Mannagh bee oo er-y-fa shen er dty arrey , hig-ym ort myr maarliagh , as cha bee fys ayd cre’n oor hig-ym ort .
Chloan veggey , ny lhig da dooinney erbee shin y volley : eshyn ta jannoo cairys , t’eh cairagh , dy jarroo myr t’eshyn cairagh .
Chaarjyn , ny cred-jee dy chooilley spyrryd , agh prow-jee ny spyrrydyn vel ad veih Jee : er-yn-oyr dy vel ymmodee phadeyryn foalsey er n’gholl magh ’sy theihll .
Toig-jee shiuish er-y-fa shen , gheiney as vraaraghyn , dy nee ny hrooidsyn ta leih peccaghyn er ny phreacheil diu :
Ny-sodjey , my vraaraghyn , gow-jee boggey ayns y Chiarn . Dy scrieu ny reddyn cheddin hiuish , cha vel eh deinagh dooys , agh diuish te vondeishagh .
As my ta dooinney erbee accryssagh , lhig eh gee ec y thie ; nagh jig shiu cooidjagh gys deyrey . Er son reddyn elley nee’m ad y oardrail tra hig-ym .
Eisht dooyrt Pilate roo , Gow-jee shiuish eh , as jean-jee eh y vriwnys cordail rish y leigh eu hene . Dooyrt ny Hewnyn er-y-fa shen rish , Cha vel eh lowal dooinyn dooinney erbee y chur gy-baase :
Agh yeearree-jee dy jeean ny ard-ghiootyn : As foast ta mee jeeaghyn diu raad foddey s’ooasle .
Son va lheid yn ard-saggyrt shoh cooie er nyn son , ta casherick , gyn loght , glen , scarrit voish peccee , as jeant ny syrjey na ny niaughyn ;
Foddym dy chooilley nhee y yannoo trooid Creest ta dy my niartaghey .
Son shoh aigney Yee , dy jarroo yn chasherickys eu , dy lhisagh shiu freayll shiu hene veih maarderys ;
Jean-jee tannaghtyn ayns padjer , as bee-jee dooishtagh ’sy chooid cheddin lesh toyrt-booise ;
Eisht hie Moses er-chea tra cheayll eh shoh , as v’eh ny yoarree ayns cheer Vadian , raad hooar eh daa vac .
Er son y dooinney dy jarroo cha lhisagh eh e chione y choodaghey , ayns wheesh as dy vel eh co-chaslys as gloyr Yee : agh ta’n ven gloyr y dooinney .
As lhig da shee Yee reill ayns ny creeaghyn eu , huggey myrgeddin ta shiu er nyn eam ayns un chorp ; as bee-jee booisal .
Son ve cooie dasyn , er e hon ta dy chooilley nhee , as liorish ta dy chooilley nhee , ayns cur lesh ymmodee mec gys gloyr , dy chasherickey captan nyn saualtys trooid surranse .
Cre voish ta cheet caggaghyn as streeughyn nyn mast’ eu ? nagh vel ad cheet veih shoh , dy jarroo veih nyn sayntyn , ta caggey ayns nyn oltyn ?
Te goo cadjin dy vel maarderys nyn mast’ eu , as lheid y vaarderys as nagh vel wheesh as er ny enmys mastey ny Ashoonyn-quaagh , dy jinnagh fer goaill da hene ben e ayrey .

Cha vel miolagh erbee er jeet nyn raad , agh lheid as ta cadjin da dooinney : agh ta Jee firrinagh , nagh lhig diuish dy ve er nyn miolaghey erskyn ny oddys shiu y ymmyrkey ; agh nee eh myrgeddin lesh y violagh raad y yannoo dy scapail , dy vod niart y ve ayndiu dy ymmyrkey eh .
Son ta fys aym , erreish dooys v’er n’immeeaght , dy jig moddee-oaldey jollyssagh stiagh nyn mast’ eu , gyn chymmey er y chioltane .
Myr shen dy vel shin hene boggyssagh ayns y lieh eu ayns kialteenyn Yee , son y meenid , as credjue eu , ayns ooilley’n tranlaase as y seaghyn ta shiu dy hurranse .
Cha vel dooinney erbee er vakin Jee ec traa erbee . My ta shin graihagh yn derrey yeh er y jeh elley , ta Jee tannaghtyn aynin , as ta’n ghraih echey dy firrinagh aynin .
Paul ny ostyl ( cha nee veih deiney , chamoo liorish dooinney , agh liorish Yeesey Creest , as Jee yn Ayr , ren eshyn y hroggal veih ny merriu . )
Son smooinee-jee ersyn ren gymmyrkey lheid ny oltooanyn veih peccee n’oï hene , er aggle dy jean shiu lhaggaghey er y raad , as coayl nyn gree .
Son my ta shin er ve soit cooidjagh ayns co-chaslys e vaase , bee mayd myrgeddin ayns co-chaslys yn irree-seose-reesht echey :
As reesht t’eh gra , Gow-jee boggey , shiuish Ashoonyn-quaagh , marish e phobble .
Nish ta’n Spyrryd ginsh dy plain , dy jean paart ayns ny laghyn s’jerree tuittym veih’n chredjue , coyrt geill da spyrrydyn molteyragh , as ynsagh drogh-spyrrydyn ;
Cur ad ayns cooinaghtyn dy ve biallagh gys ard-reilltee as pooaraghyn , dy ve ammyssagh da fir-oik , dy ve arryltagh gys dy chooilley obbyr vie ,
Son shoh t’ad dy aignagh mee-hushtagh jeh , dy nee liorish goo Yee va ny niaughyn ec y toshiaght , as yn thalloo shassoo erskyn yn ushtey , as fo’n ushtey .

Son ta Creest myrgeddin er hurranse un cheayrt son peccaghyn , yn fer-cairagh son ny mee-chairee , ( dy voddagh eh shiu y chur lesh gys Jee , ) v’eh er ny choyrt gy-baase ayns yn eill , agh er ny vioghey liorish y Spyrryd :
Son ny baare veagh eh daue gyn tushtey er ve oc jeh raad yn ynrickys , na lurg daue v’er doiggal eh , dy hyndaa veih yn anney casherick hie er livrey daue .

Nish ta shin cur sarey diu , vraaraghyn , ayns ennym nyn Jiarn Yeesey Creest , dy jean shiu scarrey shiu hene voish dy chooilley vraar ta gymmyrkey eh-hene dy mee-reilltagh , as cha nee cordail rish yn ynsagh hooar eh voïnyn .
Shen-y-fa , myr liorish un dooinney haink peccah stiagh ’sy theihll , as baase liorish peccah ; as myr shen jimmee’n baase er dy chooilley ghooinney , son dy vel ooilley er n’yannoo peccah .
Ren trooid credjue yn varriaght y gheddyn harrish reeriaghtyn , d’obbree ad cairys , hooar gialdinyn jeant mie daue , yeigh beïll lionyn ,
Tranlaasit , agh cha nee treigit ; tilgit sheese , agh cha nee er nyn stroie ;
Shiuish gheiney as vraane maarderee [ spyrrydoil ] , nagh vel fys eu dy vel caarjys y theihll noidys rish Jee ? quoi-erbee er-y-fa shen saillish ve ny charrey da’n seihll , t’eh noid Yee .
Nish tra v’ad er gholl trooid Phrygia , as cheer Ghalatia , v’ad er nyn lhiettal liorish y Spyrryd Noo dy phreacheil y goo ayns Asia ,
Agh ta’n chairys ta liorish credjue , loayrt er yn aght shoh , Ny abbyr ayns dty chree , Quoi hed seose gys niau ? ( ta shen , dy chur lesh Creest neose )
As hie yn chied er , as gheayrt eh magh e chappan er y thalloo ; as haink eh dy ve ching breinn as piandagh er ny deiney va cowrey’n veisht orroo , as orroosyn hug ooashley da’n jalloo echey .

As tra v’eh er ghoaill y lioar , huitt ny kiare cretooryn as ny kiare shanstyryn as feed sheese fenish yn Eayn , as claasaghyn ec dagh unnane oc , as siyn airhey lane dy hoar millish ourallyn , ta padjeryn ny nooghyn .
Quoi-erbee ta credjal dy nee Yeesey yn Creest , t’eh ruggit jeh Jee : as dy chooilley unnane ta graihagh ersyn ren geddyn , shynney lesh eshyn myrgeddin ta er ny gheddyn liorish .
Ny lhig dooin geearree gloyr fardalagh , brasnaghey yn derrey yeh yn jeh elley , troo yn derrey yeh mysh y jeh elley .
Ny cur oghsan da shanstyr , agh coyrlee eh myr ayr , as ny deiney saa myr braaraghyn ;

Leeideil nyn mea dy onneragh mastey ny Ashoonee ; son wheesh as dy vel ad loayrt noi eu myr drogh-yantee , dy vod ad liorish ny obbraghyn mie eu ver ad my-ner , Jee y ghloyraghey ayns laa yn chooilleen .
Mychione jeeanid son y leigh , jannoo tranlaase er yn agglish ; mychione y chairys ta liorish y leigh , gyn foill .
Eisht dênee eh jeu cre’n oor ren eh toshiaght dy choural : as dooyrt ad rish , Jea ec y chiaghtoo oor daag y chiassaghey eh .

Shen-y-fa son dy nee laa yn aarlaghey ve , as nagh beagh ny kirp er y chrosh er laa yn doonaght ( son va’n doonaght shen ny ard-laa ) ghuee ny Hewnyn er Pilate , ny lurgaghyn oc dy ve brisht , as ad dy ve goit ersooyl .

As veih shen magh va Pilate shirrey dy eaysley eh : agh deïe ny Hewnyn , gra , My lhiggys oo yn raad da yn dooinney shoh , cha nee carrey da Cesar oo : quoi-erbee ta jannoo eh-hene ny ree , t’eh loayrt noi Cesar .
Ny lhig da’n cree eu ve seaghnit : ta shiu credjal ayns Jee , cred-jee myrgeddin aynym’s .
As gyn ve agglit ayns nhee erbee liorish nyn noidyn : yn chooid cheddin ta dauesyn cowrey cronnal dy hoyrt-mow , agh diuish dy haualtys , as shen veih Jee .

Cha vel shiuish er my reih , agh ta mish er reih shiuish , as er chur shiu ayns pooar , dy vod shiu goll magh as mess y ymmyrkey , as dy vod y mess eu ve beayn : cre-erbee nee shiu y hirrey er yn Ayr ayns yn ennym aym’s , dy vod eh y chur diu eh .

Liorish credjue ren Abel chebbal gys Jee oural s’ooasle na Cain , liorish hooar eh feanish , dy row eh cairagh , Jee soiaghey jeh e ghiootyn : as liorish shoh ga dy vel eh marroo , t’eh foast loayrt .
Lhig da dooinney myr shen soiaghey j’inyn , myr jeh shirveishee Chreest , as stiurtyn jeh folliaghtyn Yee .
As huitt rollageyn yn aer gys y thalloo , myr ta billey-figgagh tilgey e vess neu-chooie , tra te criht lesh geay niartal :
Shen-y-fa my chaarjyn deyr , chea-jee veih coyrt ooashley da jallooyn .
Ny lhig da’n olk barriaght y gheddyn ort , agh fow barriaght er yn olk lesh jannoo mie .
Jeh ny reddyn shoh cur ad ayns cooinaghtyn , coyrt currym orroo kiongoyrt rish y Chiarn , nagh streeu ad mysh focklyn nagh vel gys veg yn ymmyd , agh dy choyrt sleih fo-my-cheilley .
Tayrn-jee er-gerrey gys Jee , as tayrnee eshyn er-gerrey diuish : niee-jee nyn laueyn , shiuish pheccee , as glen-jee nyn greeaghyn , shiuish dy aigney ghooble .
Agh my ta shiu jannoo soiagh jeh persoonyn , ta shiu jannoo peccah , as ta shiu deyrit liorish y leigh myr drogh-yantee .
Son cha vel Jee er n’eamagh orrin gys neu-ghlennid , agh gys casherickys .
Son ta jymmoose Yee er ny hoilshaghey veih niau noi dy chooilley vee-chraueeaght , as neu-ynrickys deiney , ta cummal yn ynrickys ayns neu-ynrickys .
Chaarjyn ghraihagh , lhig dooin graih y choyrt yn derrey yeh da’n jeh elley : son ta graih jeh Jee ; as ta dy chooilley unnane ta graihagh , er ny ruggey jeh Jee , as shione da Jee .
Eshyn ta gra dy vel eh ’sy toilshey , as teoh echey er e vraar , t’eh dy jarroo foast ayns dorraghys .
