My ta shiu oltooanit er coontey ennym Chreest , s’maynrey ta shiu ; son ta’n spyrryd dy ghloyr , as dy Yee tannaghtyn erriu : er yn ayrn ocsyn t’eh oltooanit , agh er yn ayrn euish t’eh er ny ghloyraghey .
As tra v’eh er vannaghey daue , hoilshee eh daue ayns coorse ny reddyn va Jee er n’obbraghey mastey ny Ashoonee liorish y chirveish echeysyn .
Quoi jiuish ta cur peccah my lieh ? as my ta mee gra yn irriney , cre’n-fa nagh vel shiu dy my chredjal ?
As er ny peccaghyn as y vee-chairys oc cha gooin-ym ny smoo .
Son dy vel shiuish ayns dy chooilley nhee dy palchey er nyn yannoo magh liorishyn ayns dy chooilley ghlare , as ayns dy chooilley hushtey ;
Nish ta mee guee erriu , vraaraghyn , er graih nyn Jiarn Yeesey Creest , as er graih’n Spyrryd , dy jean shiu gobbraghey cooidjagh mârym ayns nyn badjeryn gys Jee er my hon’s ;
Dreggyr y pobble eh , as dooyrt ad , Ta drogh-spyrryd breagagh aynyd : Quoi ta shirrey dty vioys y ghoaill ?
Eh ta Jee er chiarail dy ve ny lhiassaghey , trooid credjue ayns e uill , dy hoilshaghey magh e chairys son leih peccaghyn t’er n’gholl shaghey , trooid meenid Yee :
As va ny sharvaantyn as ny fir-oik nyn shassoo ayns shen , ec aile geayil v’ad er n’yannoo ( son ve feayr ) as v’ad dyn jiow ad-hene .
Cur-jee erriu slane eilley Yee , dy vod shiu ve abyl dy hassoo noi kialgyn y drogh-spyrryd .
Dooyrt Peddyr rish , Hiarn , cre’n-fa nagh voddym geiyrt ort nish ? scarrym rish my vioys er dty ghraih .
As nee shee Yee ta erskyn dy chooilley hushtey ny creeaghyn as ny aignaghyn eu y reayll trooid Creest Yeesey .
Lesh ta shin bannaghey Jee , dy jarroo yn Ayr ; as lesh ta shin gweeaghyn da deiney , ta jeant lurg caslys Yee .

Ny-yeih cha nee ooilley-cooidjagh rish maarderee yn theihll shoh , ny rish ny sayntoilee , ny ny tranlaasee , ny roosyn ta cur ooashley da jallooyn ; son eisht beign diu dy jarroo goll ass y theihll .
Ghow mish dy jarroo aym pene dy lhisin ymmodee reddyn y yannoo noi ennym Yeesey dy Nazareth .
Lesh sooillyn soit er brishey-poosey , as nagh vod scuirr veih peccah ; molley anmeenyn lhag-chredjuagh : creeaghyn t’oc , cliaghtit er obbraghyn sayntoilagh ; cloan ny mollaght :

Agh eshyn ta failt , as cha nee yn bochilley hene , as nagh vel ny kirree lesh hene , t’eh fakin yn moddey-oaldey cheet , as t’eh faagail ny kirree , as roie er-chea : as ta’n moddey-oaldey dyn dayrtyn ad , as skeayley ny kirree .
Shen-y-fa , my vraaraghyn ghraihagh , lhig da dy chooilley ghooinney ve arryltagh dy chlashtyn , lhiastey dy loayrt , moal gys corree :
Dy jarroo myr shen ta’n Chiarn myrgeddin er n’oardaghey , dy lhisagh adsyn ta preacheil y sushtal , baghey er y sushtal .
Ta mish er jeet my hoilshey gys y theihll , quoi-erbee nee credjal aynym’s nagh jean eh tannaghtyn ayns y dorraghys .
Ny lurg shen hooar Yeesey eh ayns y chiamble , as dooyrt eh rish , Cur-my-ner , t’ou er dty laanaghey : ny jean peccah ny smoo , er-aggle dy jig red smessey ort .
Lhig da ooilley ny cooishyn eu ve jeant ayns graih Chreestee .
My ta shiu graihagh orrym’s , freill-jee my annaghyn .

Jeeagh-jee nagh der shiu cooyl rishyn ta loayrt : son mannagh ren adsyn scapail hug cooyl rishyn ren loayrt er y thalloo , foddey smoo cha jig eh lhienyn , my hyndaa-ys mayd ersooyl voishyn ta loayrt veih niau :
Agh ny-yeih , tra nagh row enney eu er Jee , va shiu ayns bondiaght dauesyn nagh nee jeeghyn ad liorish dooghys .
Erreish da Jee v’er hroggal seose e vac Yeesey , hug eh hiuish eh hoshiaght dy nyn mannaghey liorish chyndaa dy chooilley unnane eu veih e vee-chraueeaght .
As ta shinyn nyn veanishyn jeh dy chooilley nhee ren eh chammah ayns cheer ny Hewnyn , as ayns Jerusalem ; eshyn hug ad dy baase er billey ny croshey :

Nish ta mee guee erriu , vraaraghyn , liorish ennym nyn Jiarn Yeesey Creest , dy bee shiu ooilley er yn un ockle , as nagh bee streeuaghyn ny mast’ eu ; agh dy bee shiu sniemmit cooidjagh ’syn un aigney , as ’syn un smooinaght .
As shiuish va roish nish nyn yoarreeyn , as noidyn ayns nyn aigney liorish obbraghyn mee-chrauee , agh t’eh nish er choardail [ rish Jee ] .
Chea myrgeddin veih yeearreeyn yn aegid : agh eiyr da ynrickys , credjue , graih , [ as ] shee , mâroosyn ta geamagh er y Chiarn ass cree glen .
My ta shiuish eisht er n’irree marish Creest , shir-jee ny reddyn shen ta er nyn skyn , raad ta Creest ny hoie er laue yesh Yee .
Heid y chied ainle , as haink claghyn-sniaghtee as aile lesh fuill ny chione , as v’ad er nyn gheayrtey er y thalloo : as va’n trass ayrn jeh ny biljyn losht , as va ooilley yn faiyr glass losht .
Gra , Ta shin cur booise dhyt’s , O Hiarn Yee Ooilley-niartal , ta , as va , as ta ry-heet ; son dy vel oo er ghoaill hood hene dty phooar vooar , as er reill .
Dreggyr Yeesey , as dooyrt eh r’ee , Dy beagh fys ayd’s er gioot Yee , as quoi eh ta gra rhyt , Cur jough dou ? veagh oo er hirrey ersyn , as veagh eh er chur dhyt ushtey bio .
Tra vees Creest , ta’n vea ain , er ny hoilshaghey , eisht nee shiuish neesht cheet kionfenish mârishyn ayns gloyr .
Agh t’ad shoh scruit , dy voddagh shiuish credjal dy nee Yeesey yn Creest Mac Yee , as liorish credjal shiu dy chosney bea trooid yn ennym echeysyn .

Ta shinyn veih Jee : eshyn shione da Jee , t’eh geaishtagh rooin ; eshyn nagh vel veih Jee , cha vel eh coyrt clashtyn dooin . Liorish shoh ta shin cronnaghey Spyrryd ny firriney veih’n spyrryd dy volteyrys .

T’ad shoh spuitt ayns nyn guirraghyn dy ghraih , tra t’ad ec gien mêriu , lhieeney ad-hene fegooish aggle : bodjallyn t’ad gyn ushtey , eebrit lesh y gheay ; biljyn ta’n blaa oc fioghey , fegooish mess , keayrt as keayrt er n’gholl naardey , astyrit ass ny fraueyn ;
Ayns wheesh as dy dug ad lhieu magh ayns ny straidyn sleih chingey nyn lhie er lhiabbaghyn as lhiaghtyn , dy voddagh eer scadoo Pheddyr goll shaghey ; cheet er paart jeu .
Harrysdoo ooilley , gow-jee yn shleiy dy chredjue , dy vod shiu lesh shen ve abyl dy vooghey ooilley sideyn aileagh y drogh-er .
As cre-erbee ta shiu dy yannoo , jean-jee eh dy creeoil , myr da’n Chiarn , as cha nee da deiney ;
Er-aggle dy bee maarderagh erbee , ny persoon erbee mee-chrauee , myr Esau , ren son un longey dy vee e eiraght y chreck .
Eisht deïe ad ooilley reesht , gra , Cha nee eh shoh , agh Barabbas . Nish va Barabbas ny roosteyr .
Traitooryn , teaymagh , ard-aignagh , ny s’graihee er eunyssyn y vea shoh na er Jee ;
Shen-y-fa ta Jee myrgeddin er hoiaghey eh seose dy ard , as er choyrt da ennym ta erskyn dy chooilley ennym :
Son cha vel shin er n’eiyrt da skeeallyn troggit dy croutagh , tra ren shin soilshaghey diu pooar as cheet nyn Jiarn Yeesey Creest , agh va shin feanishyn sooilley jeh e ard-ooashley .

Myr t’eh myrgeddin ayns ooilley ny screeunyn echey , loayrt ayndoo jeh ny reddyn shoh : nyn mast’ oc ta paart jeu doillee dy ve er nyn doiggal , t’adsyn ta mee-hushtagh as lhag-chredjuagh cassey , myr t’ad myrgeddin ny scriptyryn elley , gys y toyrt-mow oc hene .
Agh tra cheayll ny ostyllyn Barnabas as Paul jeh , raip ad nyn eaddagh , as roie ad stiagh mastey yn pobble , geamagh ,
Nish ta mee gra , dy row Yeesey Creest ny hirveishagh jeh’n ghiarey-chymmylt , son firrinys Yee , dy hickyraghey ny gialdynyn va jeant da ny ayraghyn .
My ta dooinney erbee nyn mast’ eu ta ayns fakin dy ve crauee , as nagh vel smaghtaghey e hengey , agh moylley yn cree echey hene , ta craueeaght yn dooinney shoh fardail .

Cooinee-jee er y raa loayr mish riu , Cha vel y charvaant ny syrjey na e hiarn . My t’ad er n’yannoo tranlaase orrym’s , nee ad myrgeddin tranlaase erriuish : my t’ad er vreayll my ghoan’s , freillee ad ny goan euish myrgeddin .
Eisht dooyrt Yeesey rish ny Hewnyn shen va credjal ayn , My nee shiu tannaghtyn ayns my ghoo , eisht bee shiu dy jarroo ny ynseydee aym’s ;
Nish haink genney harrish ooilley cheer Egypt as Chanaan , as seaghyn mooar ; as cha voddagh ny ayraghyn ain beaghey y gheddyn .
S’mooar va my voggey , dy dooar mee [ paart ] jeh dty chloan , gimmeeaght ’syn irriney , myr ta shin er gheddyn sarey veih’n Ayr .
Agh mannagh vel fer erbee kiarail cour e vooinjer hene , as erskyn ooilley ny chour ocsyn ta jeh’n lught-thie echey hene , t’eh er n’obbal y credjue , as t’eh ny smessey na an-chreestee .
Lhig dooin tayrn er-gerrey lesh cree firrinagh , ayns slane shickyrys dy chredjue , liorish nyn greeaghyn v’er nyn ghlenney veih drogh chooinsheanse , as nyn girp er nyn niee lesh ushtey glen .
Agh v’ad ny-lomarcan er chlashtyn , Dy vel eshyn ren ’sy traa pastit tranlaase orrin , nish preacheil yn credjue v’eh roïe dy stroie .
Shen-y-fa my choyrle’s eh shiu dy ghoaill beaghey ; son te cour nyn slaynt : son cha duitt wheesh renaig jeh kione unnane eu .
As t’ou er n’ymmyrkey yn errey , as ta ayd meenid , as er graih my ennym t’ou er hooilleil , as cha vel oo er choayl dty chree .
Dy bee ny shenn gheiney fudagh , soccaragh , sheelt , fondagh ’sy chredjue , ayns giastyllys , ayns meenid :
As er earishyn y vee-hushtey oc , cha ghow Jee kerraghey ; agh nish t’eh cur sarey da dy chooilley ghooinney er feaï-ny-cruinney arrys y ghoaill :
Nish va nyn shassoo liorish crosh Yeesey , e voir , as shuyr e vayrey , Moirrey ben Cleopas , as Moirrey Malaine .
As v’eh coamrit lesh garmad tummit ayns fuill : as ta’n ennym echey , Goo Yee .
Agh cur-jee twoaie er-aggle liorish aght erbee dy bee shoh nyn reamys oyr dauesyn ta annoon dy huittym ayns peccah .
As mychione dy hrog eh seose eh veih ny merriu , as nagh row eh arragh dy hyndaa gys loauid , dooyrt eh er yn aght shoh , Ver-yms diu myghinyn shickyr Ghavid .
Ayns y laa shen vees fys eu dy vel mish ayns my Ayr , as shiuish aynym’s , as mish ayndiuish .
As liorish shoh ta fys ain , dy vel enney ain er , my ta shin freayll e annaghyn .
Dooyrt mee er-y-fa shen riu , dy voghe shiu baase ayns nyn beccaghyn : son mannagh vel shiu credjal dy nee mish eh , yiow shiu baase ayns nyn beccaghyn .
As honnick mee yn ven er-meshtey lesh fuill ny nooghyn , as lesh fuill feanishyn Yeesey : as tra honnick mee ee , ghow mee yindys erskyn towse .

Son ta fys eu kys ny lurg shen tra v’eh aggindagh dy gheddyn yn eiraght marish y bannaght , v’eh er ny yiooldey : son cha row saase son caghlaa-aigney ’sy chooish , ga dy ren eh aghin dy jeean lesh jeïr .
As va lane argane mastey yn pobble mychione echey : son va paart gra , She dooinney mie eh : as feallagh elley gra , Cha nee ; agh t’eh molley yn pobble .
As va laue yn Chiarn mâroo : as ren earroo mooar dy leih credjal as chyndaa gys y Chiarn .
Agh myr va shin lowit liorish Jee currym y tushtal dy ve orrin , dy jarroo myr shoh ta shin loayrt , cha nee shirrey deiney y wooiys , agh Jee , ta trial nyn greeaghyn .
Agh booise dy row gys Jee ta coyrt dooin yn varriaght , trooid nyn Jiarn Yeesey Creest .
Nish t’ee shen ta dy jarroo ny ben-treoghe , as treigit , treishteil ayns Jee , as tannaghtyn ayns aghinyn as padjeryn oie as laa .
Cha vel shiu foast er hirrey nhee erbee ayns yn ennym aym’s : shir-jee , as yiow shiu , dy vod y boggey eu v’er ny yannoo magh .
Vel oo er dty eam tra t’ou dty harvaant ? ny bee fo imnea er y hon : agh my oddys oo ve er dty eaysley , gow eh myr reih .
Shoh ad ta scarrey ad-hene voïn , sleih foalley , fegooish Spyrryd Yee .
Ta mee goaill yindys , dy vel shiu cha leah er nyn jyndaa , voishyn ren shiuish y eam trooid grayse Chreest , gys sushtal elley :
Eiyr-jee da shee rish dy chooilley ghooinney , as da craueeaght , n’egooish cha vod dooinney erbee yn Chiarn y akin .
As dooyrt eh roo , Cuir-jee magh yn lieen er y cheu-yesh jeh’n lhong , as bee eh eu . Eisht chuir ad : as nish cha row dy niart oc yn lieen y ghoaill stiagh va lhied y thummyd eeast ayn .
Cha vel giarey-chymmylt veg , as cha vel an-ghiarey-chymmylt veg , agh freaylley annaghyn Yee .
Ny eshyn ta coyrlaghey , da coyrle ; eshyn ta cur da’n voght , lhig da ’yannoo eh lesh feoiltys ; eshyn ta reill , lesh imnea ; eshyn ta soilshaghey myghin , lesh gennallys .
As dooyrt eh roo , Vel shiu er gheddyn yn Spyrryd Noo neayr as ren shiu credjal ? Dooyrt adsyn rish , Cha vel shin wheesh as er chlashtyn dy vel Spyrryd Noo ayn .
As my ta dooinney erbee nagh vel coyrt biallys da’n goo ain liorish y screeuyn shoh , gow-jee baght er-lheh jeh’n dooinney shen , as ny jean-jee sheshaght rish , dy vod eh goaill nearey .
Nish shoh ta mee dy ghra , vraaraghyn , nagh vod feill as fuill eiraght y gheddyn ayns reeriaght Yee ; chamoo nee neu-ghlennid geddyn glennid ayns eiraght .
Ny bee-jee imneagh son y beaghey ta cherraghtyn , agh son y beaghey shen ta tannaghtyn gys y vea veayn , nee yn Mac dooinney y choyrt diu : son eshyn ta Jee yn Ayr er chowraghey .
Ta shiu geearree as cha vel shiu geddyn , er-y-fa dy vel shiu geearree ass y raad , dy vod shiu y vaarail eh er ny sayntyn eu hene .
Coyrt booise dy kinjagh son dy chooilley nhee da Jee dy jarroo yn Ayr , ayns ennym nyn Jiarn Yeesey Creest ;
Dy feer myr ren Abraham credjal Jee , as va shen er ny choyrt gys e lieh son cairys .
As cha row yn ard-valley shoh feme yn ghrian , chamoo yn eayst dy cheau soilshey urree : son hug gloyr Yee soilshey jee , as ta’n Eayn yn soilshey eck .
Agh cha vel shiuish ayns yn eill , agh ayns y Spyrryd , my she shen dy vel Spyrryd Yee baghey ayndiu . Nish mannagh vel ec dooinney erbee Spyrryd Chreest , cha nee leshyn eh .
As bee adsyn myrgeddin , mannagh vel ad dy kinjagh tannaghtyn ayns mee-chredjue , er nyn soiaghey stiagh : son ta Jee abyl dy hoiaghey ad stiagh reesht .
As ayns nyn meeal cha row ry-gheddyn foalsaght erbee : son t’ad gyn-loght kiongoyrt rish stoyl-reeoil Yee .

Agh shoh ta mee goaill-rish hood’s , lurg yn aght t’adsyn genmys shaghrynys veih’n chredjue , dy nee shen myr ta mish cur ooashley da Jee my ayraghyn , credjal dagh nhee ta scruit ayns y leigh as ny phadeyryn :
Ny bee-jee fo lhiastynys son nhee erbee da dooinney erbee , agh dy choyrt graih yn derrey yeh da’n jeh elley : son t’eshyn ta graihagh er fer elley , er lhieeney yn leigh .
As va deiney losht lesh y chiass mooar , as loayr ad dy mollaghtagh noi ennym Yee , echey ta pooar harrish ny briwnyssyn trome shoh : as cha ghow ad arrys , dy chur gloyr da .
As va voalley eck mooar as ard , er va daa ghiat jeig , as ec ny giattyn daa ainle jeig , as enmyn scruit orroo , ta enmyn daa heeloghe jeig chloan Israel .
Ta Creest er livrey shin veih mollaght y leigh , eh-hene jeant ny vollaght er nyn son : son te scruit , Cursit ta dagh unnane ta croghey er billey :
Son ta shiu er chlashtyn jeh m’ymmyrkey-bea t’er n’gholl shaghey , ayns credjue ny Hewnyn , kys dy ren mee tranlaase erskyn towse y yannoo er agglish Yee , dy stroie eh :
As haare eh greme er y dragon yn chenn ard-nieu shen , ta’n jouyl as Satan , as ren eh eh y chiangley son thousane bleïn ,
Agh va dooinney dy row enmyssit Simon , va er chliaghtey obbeeys ’syn ard-valley cheddin , as er chur shaghrynys er pobble Samaria , boggyssagh jeh hene dy ve ny ard-ghooinney ennagh .
Dy vod enney ’ve aym ersyn , as toiggal pooar yn irree-seose reesht echey , as yn ayrn t’aym’s ayns e hurranse , dy ve er my yannoo casley rishyn ayns e vaase ;
Ny cur laueyn dy siyragh er dooinney erbee , chamoo gow ayrn jeh peccaghyn deiney elley : freill oo hene glen .
Ny shenn vraane myrgeddin , dy bee ad dy ymmyrkey-bea crauee , cha nee scammyltee , ny cur rour saynt da feeyn , soilshaghey sampleyr mie ;
Myr shoh eisht , eshyn ta dy choyrt ee ayns poosey , t’eh jannoo dy mie : agh eshyn nagh vel dy choyrt ee ayns poosey , t’eh jannoo ny share .
Agh bee-jee shiuish jeantee jeh’n goo , as cha nee ny-lomarcan clashtyn rish , molley shiu hene .
Ny lurg shoh duirree Yeesey ayns Galilee : son cha row eh booiagh cummal ayns Judea , er-yn-oyr dy row ny Hewnyn shirrey eh y varroo .
Agh jehsyn ta shiuish ayns Creest Yeesey eshyn ta liorish Jee er ny yannoo dooinyn creenaght , as cairys , as casherickys , as livrey-ys :
Eisht hug eh ushtey ayns saagh , as ren eh toshiaght dy niee cassyn e ostyllyn , as dy rubbey ad lesh yn aanrit va ec e chryss .
As ren mee tranlaase er y chredjue shoh gys y baase , kianley as livrey gys pryssoonyn chammah deiney as mraane .
Myr shen va streeu mastey’n pobble mychione echey .
Cur-jee beaghey da shioltane Yee ta ny mast’ eu , goaill y currym harrystoo , cha nee myr êginit , agh dy aggindagh ; cha nee er coontey cosney naareydagh , agh jeh aigney arryltagh ;
Gah yn vaaish she peccah eh ; as niart peccah yn leigh eh .

Cur-my-ner , ta faill ny labreeyn , ta er vuinn ny magheryn eu , ta lieriuish er ny reayll voue dy molteyragh , gaccan : as ta eam ny beayneeyn er n’gholl stiagh ayns cleayshyn y Chiarn dy Heshaght-chaggee flaunys .
Shen-y-fa coyrt dy lhiattee dy chooilley ghoanlys , as dy chooilley volteyraght , as foalsaght , as troo , as dy chooilley ghrogh ghlare ,
Ta’n ven fo kiangley yn leigh choud as s’bio yn sheshey eck : agh my ta’n dooinney eck geddyn baase , t’ee ec e reamys hene dy ve poost rish quoi-erbee saillee ; agh ayns y Chiarn .
Ta er n’gholl er-shaghryn veih’n irriney , gra , Dy vel yn irree-seose-reesht veih ny merriu hannah harrish ; as [ liorish shoh ] lhaggaghey credjue paart dy lieh .
Son ayns Yeesey Creest , cha vel giarey-chymmylt jeh veg y vondeish , ny an-ghiarey chymmylt , agh credjue ta gobbraghey liorish graih .
As myr shoh er ny chasherickey , haink eh dy ve bun y taualtys dy bragh farraghtyn dauesyn ooilley ta coyrt biallys da ;
Nish mychione y chaglym son ny nooghyn , myr ta mee er n’oardaghey da kialteenyn Ghalatia , jean-jee shiuish myrgeddin .
Shiuish vraane-poost , jean-jee shiu hene y injillaghey gys ny deiney-poost eu , myr gys y Chiarn .
Eisht loayr Yeesey roo reesht , gra , Mish soilshey yn theihll : eshyn ta geiyrt orrym’s , cha shooyllee eh ayns y dorraghys , agh bee echeysyn soilshey yn vea ,
Agh , chaarjyn , cooinee jee er ny goan va roïe loayrit liorish ostyllyn nyn Jiarn Yeesey Creest :
Chamoo t’eh er ny ooashlaghey lesh laueyn deiney , myr dy beagh eh feme nhee erbee , fakin dy vel eh coyrt da ooilley bioys , as ennal , as dy chooilley nhee ;
My ta shin goaill feanish gheiney , ta feanish Yee ny s’troshey : son shoh feanish Yee , t’eh er n’ymmyrkey jeh e Vac .
Agh cur-jee erriu yn Chiarn Yeesey Creest , as ny gow-jee kiarail erbee son yn eill , dy chooilleeney yn thaynt eck .
Liorish credjue huitt voallaghyn Yericho , lurg daue ve combaasit mygeayrt shiaght laa .
As s’mooar va ny mirrilyn ren Jee y obbraghey liorish laueyn Phaul :
Dreggyr Yeesey ad , Dy firrinagh-focklagh ta mee gra riu , Quoi-erbee ta cur-rish peccah , t’eh ayns bondiaght peccah .
My chaarjyn , my hug Jee myr shoh graih dooin , lhisagh shinyn myrgeddin graih y choyrt yn derrey yeh da’n jeh elley .
T’ou er hoilshaghey dooys raaidyn y vea ; ta dty eddin er my lhieeney lesh gerjagh .
Derrey hig-ym , bee kiaralagh dy lhaih , dy choyrlaghey , dy ynsaghey .
Ta shin seaghnit er dagh cheu , agh cha vel shin ayns chennid : ta shin êginit , agh cha vel shin fo mee-hreishteil ;
Agh va feallagh elley gannidys , as gra , Ta ny deiney shoh lane dy feeyn noa ,
As va stoo yn voalley eck jeh jasper ; as va’n ard-valley jeh airh ghlen , goll-rish gless sollys .
As haink ny shiaght ainleyn magh ass y chiamble , as ny shiaght kerraghyn oc , coamrit lesh aanrit glen as gial , as cryssyn airh mysh nyn mean .
Bannee-jee adsyn ta jannoo tranlaase erriu ; bannee-jee , as ny gwee-jee mollaght .
As e chassyn goll-rish prash sollys , myr dy beagh ad lheïe ayns coirrey ; as e choraa myr sheean ymmodee ushtaghyn .
As ta mee er hoilshaghey daue dt’ennym’s , as nee’m y hoilshaghey eh : dy vod y graih , liorish t’ou er ve graihagh orrym’s , ve ayndoo , as mish ayndoosyn .
Eshyn nagh ren e Vac hene y haghney , agh livrey eh eh seose er nyn son ooilley , kys nagh der eshyn dooin myrgeddin dy arryltagh mârishyn dy chooilley nhee ?
Kys dinsh ad diu , dy beagh craidoilee ayns ny laghyn s’jerree , yinnagh gimmeeaght lurg ny yeearreeyn mee-chrauee oc hene .
Ny jean uss oo hene y ymmyrkey dy mooaralagh noi ny banglaneyn : agh my t’ou boggyssagh , cha vel oo gymmyrkey yn fraue , agh y fraue uss .
Cha nee dy vel shin gymmyrkey reill harrish nyn gredjue , agh ta shin fir-choonee dy vishaghey nyn moggey : son liorish credjue ta shiu shassoo .
Nish va dooinney dy row ching , va enmyssit Lazarus dy Vethany , balley Voirrey as y chuyr eck Martha .
Eshyn er-y-fa shen ta soiaghey beg , cha vel eh soiaghey beg jeh dooinney , agh jeh Jee , ta myrgeddin er choyrt dooinyn e Spyrryd casherick .
Liorish shoh gow-ee shiu baght jeh Spyrryd Yee : Dy chooilley spyrryd ta goaill-rish dy vel Yeesey Creest er jeet ayns yn eill , t’eh jeh Jee .
Er yn aght cheddin neesht ta ny branlaadee shoh sollaghey yn eill , soiaghey beg jeh reilltys , as goltooaney ny pooaraghyn syrjey .
Lhig da chea veih olk , as jannoo mie ; lhig da shee y hirrey , as lhiantyn huggey .

My nee shiu tannaghtyn ’sy chredjue gruntit as shickyrit , as gyn ve scughit ersooyl veih treishteil y tushtal , ta shiu er chlashtyn , as v’er ny phreacheil da dy chooilley chretoor fo niau ; jeh shen ta mish Paul pointit dy ve my hirveishagh .
Eisht hrog ad claghyn dy cheau er : agh cheill Yeesey eh-hene voue , as hie eh magh ass y chiamble , goll trooid y cheed oc , as myr shen hie eh shaghey .
As cur-jee erriu yn dooinney noa , ta lurg Jee er ny chroo ayns ynrickys as craueeaght firrinagh .
Ayns shoh ta meenid ny nooghyn ; shoh’n raad t’adsyn ta cur tastey da annaghyn Yee , as da credjue Yeesey .
Agh hrog Jee seose eh veih ny merriu :
Mish y bochilley mie : ta’n bochilley mie cur e vioys son ny kirree .
My she shen dy vel shiu er chlashtyn jeh’n phooar t’er ny choyrt dooys dy hirveish erriu grayse Yee .
Dooinney ta jannoo boiraghyn ’syn agglish , lurg raaue v’er ny choyrt da yn nab cheayrt , lhig da ve giarit-magh :
Va streeu er-y-fa shen reesht mastey ny Hewnyn son ny raaghyn shoh .
Eshyn t’er n’yannoo soiaghey jeh’n eanish echey , t’eh er chur y seal echey huggey , dy vel Jee firrinagh .
Shen-y-fa , chaarjyn , fakin dy vel shiu jerkal rish lheid ny reddyn , bee-jee imneagh dy bee shiu er nyn gheddyn liorishyn ayns shee , fegooish foill , as gyn loght .
Ny sodjey , vraaraghyn , gow-jee padjer er nyn son , dy vod goo’n Chiarn roie dyn lhiettal , as ve er ny ghloyraghey dy jarroo myr te nyn mast’ euish ;
Toiggal dy jean eshyn hrog seose y Chiarn Yeesey , shinyn myrgeddin y hroggal liorish Yeesey , as shinyn y ghoaill stiagh mêriu .
Vel veg ching ny mast’ eu ? lhig da fys y choyrt er fir-reill ny hagglish ; as lhig daue padjer y ghoaill er e hon , gooillaghey eh lesh ooil ayns ennym y Chiarn :
As tra v’eh slane da-eed bleïn dy eash , haink eh ayns e chree dy gholl dy yeeaghyn e vraaraghyn cloan Israel .
Va’n dooinney shoh goit ec ny Hewnyn , as myr v’ad er chee dy varroo eh , haink mish lesh sheshaght dy hidooryn , as haue mee eh voue , tra hoig mee dy nee Romanagh v’eh .
As va ooilley yn ard-valley bun-ry-skyn : as erreish daue v’er ghoaill Gaius as Aristarchus , Macedonianee , sheshaghyn troailtee Phaul , ying ad stiagh ooilley dy cheilley ayns y theater .
Agh dob shiuish yn Fer-noo casherick , cairagh , as hir shiu dunver er nyn accan dy ve livreït diu ,
As cha dug eh liettrimys erbee eddyr adsyn as shinyn , casherickey ny creeaghyn oc liorish credjue .
Agh lhig da dooinney eh-hene y eysht ; as myr shen lhig da gee jeh’n arran shen , as giu jeh’n chappan shen .

Shen-y-fa , my chaarjyn graihagh , shass-jee shickyr , gyn scughey , dy kinjagh goll er nyn doshiaght ayns obbyr y Chiarn , son wheesh as dy vel fys eu nagh vel y laboraght eu ayns fardail ayns y Chiarn .
Shen-y-fa ta mee guee erriu , eiyr-jee orrym’s .
Son fakin ayns creenaght Yee , nagh dug y seihll liorish creenaght enney er Jee , ve aigney Yee liorish ommijys preacheil dy hauail adsyn ta credjal .

Myrgeddin , shiuish vraane-poost , bee-jee ayns biallys da ny sheshaghyn eu ; my ta veg jeusyn nagh vel biallagh da’n goo , dy vod ad myrgeddin fegooish y goo ve er ny chosney liorish ymmyrkey-bea ny mraane .
Nish ta shinyn chaghteryn ayns lieh Chreest , myr dy beagh Jee dy chuirrey shiu liorinyn : ta shin guee erriu ayns ynnyd Chreest , bee-jee coardit rish Jee .
Eshyn ta Jee er hroggal seose reesht veih ny merriu , liorish feaysley geulaghyn e vaaish : son nagh row eh ayns pooar y vaaish dy chummal fo eh .
Nagh vel ad goltooan yn ennym ooasle shen ta enmyssit erriu ?
Cha nee iuder-feeyney , ny builltagh , ny sondagh er cosney scammyltagh , agh surransagh , cha nee fer streeuagh , ny sayntoilagh ;
Agh quoi-erbee iu-ys jeh’n ushtey ver-yms da , cha bee eh dy bragh paagh : agh bee yn ushtey ver-ym da ny farrane ushtey ayn nee geill gys y vea ta dy bragh farraghtyn .
Agh quoi-erbee ta freayll e ghoo , aynsyn ta graih Yee dy firrinagh jeant mie : liorish shoh ta fys ain dy vel shin aynsyn .
As honnick mee three spyrrydyn neu-ghlen goll-rish frogyn cheet magh ass beeal y dragon , as magh ass beeal y veisht , as magh ass beeal y phadeyr foalsey .
My ta shiu cooilleeney yn leigh reeoil , cordail rish y scriptyr , Ver oo graih da dty naboo myr dhyt hene , ta shiu jannoo dy mie .
Son cha nee shin hene ta shin dy phreacheil , agh Creest yn Chiarn : as shin hene ny sharvaantyn euish er graih Yeesey .
Ny bee-jee mollit ; ta drogh heshaght cur mow ellyn mie .
Nish dy jean Jee ny shee hug lesh reesht veih ny merriu nyn Jiarn Yeesey , ard-vochilley ny geyrragh , trooid fuill y chonaant dy bragh farraghtyn ,

Erskyn ooilley , lhig da’n ymmyrkey-bea eu ve cordail rish sushtal Chreest : myr shen edyr mee dy heet dy yeeaghyn shiu , ny gyn cheet , dy voddym clashtyn jeh nyn stayd , dy vel shiu shassoo shickyr ayns un Spyrryd , lesh un aigney streeu cooidjagh son credjue yn tushtal ;
As ta Jee chammah er hroggal seose y Chiarn , as nee eh myrgeddin shinyn y hroggal seose liorish e phooar hene .
Shen-y-fa ta mee coyrt oo ayns cooinaghtyn , dy jean oo greesaghey seose gioot Yee , ta aynyd , liorish coyrt my laueyn ort .
Son , er-yn-oyr shoh va’n sushtal myrgeddin er ny phreacheil dauesyn ta marroo , dy voddagh ad ve er nyn mriwnys cordail rish deiney ayns yn eill , agh baghey cordail rish Jee ayns y spyrryd .
Ta shiuish kionnit lesh price , ny bee-jee sharvaantyn gheiney .
Chamoo jean shiuish tallagh , myr ren paart jeusyn neesht tallagh , as v’ad er nyn stroie liorish y stroieder .
Son cha vel shin myr ymmodee , ta soiaghey magh goo Yee dy molteyragh : agh myr jeh’n ynrickys agh myr jeh Jee , ayns shilley Yee ta shin loayrt ayns Creest .

Dy jarroo myr shen ec yn eer traa shoh myrgeddin ta fooilliagh ayn cordail rish y conaant dy ghrayse .
Mâree ta reeaghyn y theihll er n’yannoo maarderys , as ta cummaltee ny hooirey er ve er meshtey lesh feeyn e maarderys .
Bee-jee jeh aigney dooie yn derrey yeh gys y jeh elley lesh graih braaragh , ayns onnor dagh unnane jannoo soiagh jeh fer elley roish hene .
Son whilleen as ta er ny leeideil liorish Spyrryd Yee , t’ad nyn mec dy Yee .
As va yindys mooar elley er ny akin ayns niau , as cur-my-ner , dragon mooar jiarg , lesh shiaght king , as jeih eairkyn , as shiaght attaghyn er e ching .
As my she cloan shin , eisht eiraghyn ; eiraghyn dy Yee , as co-eiraghyn marish Creest : my she shen dy vel shin surranse mârishyn , dy vod mayd myrgeddin ve cooidjagh er nyn ghloyraghey .
Lhig da ny shanstyryn ta reill dy mie , ve coontit feeu jeh ooashley dooble , erskyn ooilley adsyn ta laboragh ’sy ghoo as ynsagh .

Ny-yeih cha vel ec dy chooilley ghooinney yn tushtey shen : son ta paart liorish y toiggal t’oc jeh’n jalloo gys y traa t’ayn , gee jeh myr red t’er ny ouralley gys jalloo ; as ta’n chooin-sheanse annoon oc seaghnit .
Dy chooilley vanglane aynym’s nagh vel gymmyrkey mess , t’eh dy ghoaill ersooyl : as dy chooilley vanglane ta gymmyrkey mess , t’eh dy phollal , dy vod eh ve ny s’messoil .
Chamoo myr chiarnyn harrish eiraght Yee , agh myr sampleyryn da’n chioltane .
Agh cha baillym shiu ve mee-hushtagh , vraaraghyn , mychione ocsyn ta nyn gadley , nagh bee shiu trimshagh , dy jarroo myr feallagh elley ta fegooish treishteil .
Liorish credjue hie ad trooid y faarkey jiarg , myr er thalloo chirrym : y lheid cheddin tra ghow ny Egyptianee orroo dy yannoo , v’ad baiht .
Ayns y traa shoh rug Moses , as v’eh lhiannoo erskyn towse aalin , as v’eh er ny voandyrys dy follit three meeghyn ayns thie e ayrey :
Oddys chymmey y hoilshaghey er ny mee-hushtee , as orroosyn t’er n’gholl er-shaghryn ; son dy vel eh-hene injillit gys annooinid :
Ta’n oie foddey ceaut , ta’n laa er-gerrey : lhig dooin er-y-fa shen tilgey ersooyl obbraghyn y dorraghys , as lhig dooin cur orrin eïlley yn toilshey .
As shiuish vainshteryn , jean-jee lheid cheddin roosyn , shaghney baggyrt : toiggal shoh , dy vel mainshter eu hene myrgeddin ayns niau , chamoo t’eh jannoo soiagh jeh persoonyn .
Gow-jee boggey mâroosyn ta goaill boggey , as jean-jee dobberan mâroosyn ta dobberan .
Agh cordail rish creoghys dty chree vee-arryssagh , t’ou stoyral seose dhyt hene jymmoose cour laa’n yymmoose , as tra vees briwnys cairagh Yee er ny hoilshaghey ;
As haink shiartanse dy Hewnyn veih Antioch as Iconium , as chleaynee ad y pobble , as ren ad Paul y chlaghey as y hayrn magh ass yn ard-valley , sheiltyn dy row eh marroo .
Tra va Yeesey er ghra shoh , v’eh seaghnit ayns e spyrryd , as dymmyrk eh feanish , as dooyrt eh , Dy firrinagh firrinagh ta mee gra riu , dy jean fer jiuish mish y vrah .
Agh ta’n scriptyr er ghoaill stiagh ooilley fo peccah , dy voddagh y gialdyn liorish credjue ayns Yeesey Creest ve er ny choyrt dauesyn ta credjal .
As tra vees ad er chooilleeney nyn veanish , nee’n veisht ta girree ass y diunid gyn-grunt , caggey nyn ’oï , as yiow eh yn varriaght harrystoo , as ver eh ad dy baase .
Son ta cairys ain ayns Creest , my ta shin cummal undin nyn marrantys ersyn shickyr gys y jerrey ;
As my ta Creest ayndiu , ta’n corp marroo , kyndagh rish peccah ; agh ta’n spyrryd bea , liorish cairys .
Quoi jeh ny phadeyryn nagh ren ny ayraghyn eu tranlaase er ? as t’ad er varroo adsyn hoilshee ro-laue jeh cheet yn Ercairagh , eh ta shiuish nish er vrah as er ghunverys :

Troo , dunverys , meshtyrys , glutteraght , as y lheid : my-nyn-gione ta mee ginsh diu ro-laue , myr ta mee myrgeddin er n’insh diu ayns y traa t’er n’gholl shaghey , nagh vow adsyn ta cur rish lheid ny reddyn , reeriaght Yee ayns eiraght .
Choud as ta soilshey eu , cred-jee ayns y toilshey , dy vod shiu ve nyn gloan jeh’n toilshey . Ny goan shoh loayr Yeesey , as jimmee eh roish , as dollee eh eh-hene voue .
Va firrinagh dasyn ren eh y phointeil , myr va Moses myrgeddin firrinagh ayns ooilley e hie .
Shen t’eh dy palchey er gheayrtey orrin trooid Yeesey Creest nyn Saualtagh :
As Joses , va liorish ny ostyllyn sliennooit Barnabas ( ta shen dy ghra ’sy ghlare ainyn , Mac ny gerjee ) va ny Levite , as jeh cheer Cyprus ,
As ny lhig dooin gaase skee ayns jannoo mie , son ayns imbagh cooie nee mayd buinn , mannagh bee mayd lhiastey .
Son ta mish trooid y leigh marroo gys y leigh , dy voddym ve bio gys Jee .
As va cuirtlagh er ny choyrt dou goll-rish lorg-howshan : as hass yn ainle , gra , Trog ort , as gow towshan jeh chiamble Yee , as yn altar , as adsyn ta coyrt ooashley ayn .

Shoh ad nagh row er n’yannoo peccah rish mraane ; son moidynyn ad : shoh ad ta geiyrt da’n Eayn raad erbee dy jed eh : v’ad shoh er nyn gosney veih mastey deiney , myr v’ad ny chied messyn da Jee as da’n Eayn .
As va cummey ny locustyn goll-rish cabbyl greït son y chaggey ; as er nyn ging va attaghyn goll-rish airh , as va ny eddinyn oc goll-rish eddinyn deiney .
Myr adsyn ta seyr , fegooish jannoo ymmyd jeh’n seyrsnys eu son coodaghey dy olkys ; agh myr sharvaantyn Yee .

Son er y choontey shen ta shin chammah laboragh , as surranse scammylt , er-yn-oyr dy vel shin treishteil ayns y Jee bio , ta ny Haualtagh da dy chooilley ghooinney , erskyn ooilley dauesyn ta credjal .

Cre’n kerraghey foddey s’trimmey , ta shiuish smooinaghtyn , t’eshyn dy hoilchin , t’er stampey fo-chosh Mac Yee , as ta er choontey fuill yn chonaant liorish v’eh er ny chasherickey , ny red neu-chasherick , as er hassoo magh dy olkyssagh noi’n Spyrryd dy ghrayse ?
Eisht dooyrt Yeesey roo reesht , Shee dy row hiu ; myr ta my Ayr er my choyrt’s , myr shen ta mish coyrt shiuish .
T’ad shoh sleih ta tollagh , plaiyntee gyn oyr , gimmeeaght lurg nyn yeearreeyn hene ; as ta’n beeal oc loayrt focklyn mooarey dy ardail , brynneragh rish persoonyn deiney er graih cosney .

As ren reeaghyn y thallooin , as ny ard-gheiney , as ny berchee , as ny ard-chaptanyn , as ny deiney pooaral , as dy chooilley ghooinney ayns bondiaght , as ooilley ayns seyrsnys , ad-hene y ollaghey ayns ooigyn , as fo cregyn ny sleityn .

Agh adsyn ta faitagh , as mee-chredjuagh , as adsyn ta cur rish obbraghyn dwoaiagh , as dunveryn , as maarderee , as fir-obbee , as jallooderyn , as dy chooilley vreagerey , yiow nyn gronney ’sy logh ta lossey lesh aile as brimstone : shen y nah vaase .
As nish cre’n-fa t’ou lhiggey shaghey ? irree as bee er dty vashtey , as niee ersooyl dty pheccaghyn , geamagh er ennym y Chiarn .
As va folt oc goll-rish folt mraane , as va nyn veeacklyn goll-rish feeacklyn lionyn .
As cha nhegin da sharvaant y Chiarn ve streeuagh ; agh ve meen rish dy chooilley ghooinney , aarloo dy ynsaghey , surransagh ,
Son ga dy vel mee veue ’syn eill , ny-yeih ta mee mêriu ayns y spyrryd , goaill boggey as cur-my-ner nyn stayd , as shickyrys nyn gredjue ayns Creest .
Son ta sooillyn y Chiarn er y vooinjer ynrick , as e chleayshyn foshlit gys ny padjeryn oc : agh ta eddin y Chiarn noi ocsyn ta jannoo olk .

Agh ta shin kianlt dy chur booise kinjagh da Jee er nyn son , vraaraghyn , graihagh ayns y Chiarn , son dy vel Jee er-dyn toshiaght er reih shiu gys saualtys , trooid casherickys y Spyrryd , as credjue jeh’n irriney :

Lhig dasyn ta neu-chairagh , ve dy kinjagh neu-chairagh : as lhig dasyn ta neu-ghlen , ve kinjagh neu-ghlen : as lhig dasyn ta cairagh , ve kinjagh cairagh : as lhig dasyn ta casherick , ve kinjagh casherick .
Eisht dooyrt Peddyr roo , Gow-jee arrys , as bee-jee er nyn mashtey dy chooilley unnane eu ayns ennym Yeesey Creest , son leih peccaghyn , as yiow shiu gioot y Spyrryd Noo .
Jeeagh nagh jean veg j’iu cooilleeney olk son olk da dooinney erbee : agh dy bragh eiyr-jee er shen ta mie , chammah nyn mast’ eu hene , as rish dy chooilley ghooinney .

As ren myrgeddin ny deiney faagail ymmyd dooghyssagh y ven , lostey ayns nyn saynt yn derrey yeh gys y jeh elley , deiney rish deiney cur rish neu-ghlennid , as geddyn ayndoo hene yn cooilleeney shen va cair da nyn shaghrynys .
Er y choontey cheddin bee-jee shiuish neesht er nyn gherjaghey , as gow-jee boggey mârym’s .
Gow-jee arrys er-y-fa shen , as chyndaa-jee , dy vod shiu v’er nyn ghlenney veih nyn beccaghyn , dy vod earishyn yn ooraghey cheet erriu veih fenish y Chiarn ,
As cha bee ny giattyn eck edyr jeight ’sy laa : son cha bee oie edyr ayns shen .
Eshyn ta gee my eill , as giu my uill , ta’n vea veayn echey , as trog-yms seose eh ec y laa jerrinagh .
Dreggyr Yeesey , Cha voddagh pooar erbee y ve ayd harrym’s , mannagh beagh eh er ny choyrt dhyt veih’n yrjid ; shen-y-fa ta peccah smoo lhie ersyn ren m’y livrey hood .
Eer myr shen credjue , mannagh vel obbraghyn goll mârish , te dyn vree ny-lomarcan .
Son shen nagh voddagh y leigh y yannoo , trooid annooinid ny foalley , ren Jee liorish coyrt e Vac hene , ayns caslys feill peccoil , as son peccah , peccah y gheyrey ayns yn eill :
Agh foast my ta shiu surranse er coontey ynrickys , s’maynrey shiu : as ny bee-jee agglagh roish y baggyrt oc , chamoo bee-jee seaghnit ;
Ayraghyn , ny jean-jee nyn gloan y vrasnaghey , er-aggle dy gaill ad nyn gree .

As deïe eh dy niartal lesh coraa lajer , gra , Ta’n Babylon yn ard-valley mooar er duittym , er duittym , as er jeet dy ve ynnyd-vaghee dy youyil , as cummal dy chooilley spyrryd neu-ghlen , as edd son dy chooilley eean neu-ghlen as eajee .
Quoi yn breagerey , agh eshyn ta gobbal dy nee Yeesey yn Creest ? Eshyn ta ny an-chreestee , ta gobbal yn Ayr as y Mac .
Shen-y-fa , quoi-erbee ee-ys yn arran shoh , as iu-ys y cappan shoh jeh’n Chiarn dy neu-feeu , bee eh oolee jeh corp as fuill y Chiarn .
Agh nailt fys ’ve ayd , O ghooinney ardalagh , dy vel credjue fegooish obbraghyn marroo ?
Hooar Yuaase eisht sheshaght dy gheiney , as sidooryn veih ny ard-saggyrtyn as ny Phariseeyn , as haink eh ayns shen lesh lonteyryn , as torchyn , as armyn .
Agh ta’n Chiarn firrinagh , nee shiuish y niartaghey , as y reayll veih olk .
As tra v’eh er ny hilgey magh , ghow inneen Pharaoh eh , as hrog ee eh son mac jee hene ,
As ghow yn ainle y censer , as lhieen eh eh lesh aile veih’n altar , as hilg eh eh er y thalloo : as va coraaghyn [ agglagh , ] as taarnaghyn , as tendreilyn , as craa-hallooin .

Son ta dy chooilley ashoon er n’iu jeh feeyn pyshoonagh e maarderys , as ta reeaghyn y theihll er n’yannoo maarderys r’ee , as ta marchanyn y theihll er n’aase berchagh trooid mooadys yn rouanys eck .
Son ny oyryn shoh haare ny Hewnyn mee ayns y chiamble , as ghow ad ayns laue dy my varroo .
As chyndaa-ee ad ny cleayshyn oc ersooyl veih’n irriney , as bee ad er nyn jyndaa gys skeealyn ommijagh .
Agh ta paart jiuish nagh vel credjal . Son va fys ec Yeesey er-dyn toshiaght , quoi v’ad nagh row credjal , as quoi yinnagh eh y vrah .
Dreggyr Yeesey , She eshyn eh da ver-ym greme dy arran , tra vee’m er hummey eh . As tra v’eh er hummey yn greme , hug eh eh da Yuaase Iscariot mac Simon .
O Timothy , freill shen ny ta er ny choyrt gys dty churrym , shaghney glare mee-chrauee as fardalagh , as streeu mychione yn ynsagh shen ta far-enmyssit creenaght :

Agh ny Hewnyn mee-chredjuagh greinnit lesh goanlys , ghow ad huc shiartanse dy ghrogh gheiney mee-reiltagh ; as tra va chaglym mooar jeu oc , hug ad ooilley yn ard-valley bun-ry-skyn , as vrish ad stiagh er niart ayns thie Jason , er-chee ad y choyrt lhieu magh gys y pobble .

My ta dooinney erbee fakin e vraar cur rish peccah nagh vel gys baase , nee eh guee er e hon , as yiow eh bea er nyn son ocsyn nagh vel jannoo peccah gys baase . Ta peccah ayn gys baase : cha vel mee gra dy lhisagh eh guee er y hon .
Dy firrinagh firrinagh ta mee gra riu , Eshyn ta jannoo soiagh jeh quoi-erbee ta mee dy choyrt , t’eh jannoo soiagh jeem’s : as eshyn ta soiaghey jeem’s , t’eh soiaghey jehsyn t’er my choyrt .
Shen-y-fa fakin dy vel shinyn er gheddyn reeriaght nagh vod v’er ny scughey , lhig da grayse ve ain , liorish oddys mayd Jee y hirveish dy booisal , lesh arrym as aggle crauee .

Eisht ren shiartanse jeh ny Hewnyn va goll mygeayrt castey drogh-spyrrydyn , goaill orroo dy eamagh harrish y vooinjer va drogh-spyrrydyn ayndoo , ennym y Chiarn Yeesey , gra , Ta shin cur shiu fo harey liorish Yeesey ta Paul dy phreacheil .
As reih Paul Silas , as jimmee eh roish , erreish da v’er ny hymney gys grayse Yee liorish ny braaraghyn .
Jeeagh-jee diu hene nagh gaill mayd ny reddyn shen ta shin er chosney , agh dy vow mayd slane leagh .

Oc shoh ta pooar dy yeigh niau , nagh bee fliaghey ayn rish traa yn phadeyrys oc : as ta pooar oc harrish ny ushtaghyn dy hyndaa ad ayns fuill , as dy woalley yn thalloo lesh dy chooilley cherraghey , cha mennick as sailliu .
Cha vel aart ny paart ayd ’sy chirveish shoh : son cha vel dty chree ynrick ayns shilley Yee .
As ta ooilley ny ta lhiam’s lhiat’s , as ny ta lhiat’s lhiam’s , as ta mee er my ghloyraghey ayndoo .
T’ad ooilley er n’gholl ass y raad , t’ad ooilley dyn ymmyd : cha vel fer hene ta jannoo dy mie , cha vel unnane .
Ny lhig da nhee erbee ve jeant trooid anvea , ny mooaralys , agh ayns injillid-aigney lhig da dagh unnane soiagh ’yannoo jeh feallagh elley roish hene .
As ayns mean ny shiaght cainleyryn , fer goll-rish yn Mac dooinney , coamrit lesh garmad sheese gys ny cassyn , as kianlt mysh e chleeau lesh cryss dy airh .
As cha bee mollaght arragh : agh bee stoyl-reeoil Yee , as yn Eayn aynjee : as nee e harvaantyn eshyn y hirveish .
Agh ta jerrey dy chooilley nhee er-gerrey : bee-jee er-y-fa shen sheelt , as watch-jee gys padjer .
As veih shen ghow ad lhuingys gys Antioch , voish v’ad er ve chymnit gys grayse Yee , son yn obbyr v’ad dy chooilleeney .
Agh my t’ou poosey , cha vel oo er n’yannoo peccah ; as my ta moidyn poosey , cha vel ee er n’yannoo peccah : ny-yeih , bee seaghyn ec nyn lheid ayns yn eill ; agh ta mee gymmyrkey lhieu .
Son cha vel shin gleck noi feill as fuill , agh noi ard-reilltee , noi pooaraghyn , noi leeideilee dorraghys y theihll shoh , noi olkys spyrrydoil ayns ny ardjyn er-nyn-skyn .
My ta veg euish feme creenaght , lhig da geearree er Jee , ta coyrt dy feoilt da dy chooilley ghooinney , as nagh vel mooaraghey , as bee eh er ny choyrt da .
Ny jean-jee mooghey yn Spyrryd .
Son va cabbane-agglish soit magh , ayns y chied ayrn jeh va’n cainleyr , as y boayrd , as yn arran-casherick , ta shoh enmyssit yn ynnyd-casherick .

Ta mee cur coyrle dhyt dy chionnaghey voym airh er ny phrowal ’syn aile , dy vod oo ve berchagh ; as coamrey gial , dy vod oo ve coodit , as nagh bee dty nearey er ny akin ; as jean dty hooillyn y ooillaghey lesh shelliu-sooilley , dy vod oo fakin .
Ny reddyn shoh ta mee er scrieu hiuish ta credjal ayns ennym Mac Yee ; dy vod-shiu toiggal dy vel eu yn vea veayn , as dy vod shiu credjal ayns ennym Mac Yee .
Eshyn ta loayrt jeh hene , t’eh shirrey e ooashley hene : agh eshyn ta shirrey yn ooashley echeysyn t’er choyrt eh , t’eh shen firrinagh , as cha vel neu-chairys erbee ayn .
Agh ta’n verchys shoh ainyn ayns siyn craie , dy vod ard-ooashley yn phooar ve veih Jee , as cha nee voïnyn .
Chaarjyn ghraihagh , ny gow-jee cooilleen ec nyn laue hene , agh ny sleaie lhig-jee lesh corree : son te scruit , Lhiam’s kerraghey ; mish nee cooilleeney , ta’n Chiarn dy ghra .
Dreggyr Yeesey , My ta mee cur ooashley dou hene , cha vel my ooashley agh beggan feeu : she my Ayr ta cur ooashley dou , jehsyn ta shiuish loayrt , dy nee yn Jee eu eh :
Er coontey bee ny cur mow obbyr Yee . Ta dy chooilley nhee dy jarroo glen : agh te olk da’n dooinney shen ta gee lesh oyr scammylt .
Eisht ghow ad corp Yeesey , as hoïll ad eh ayns aanrityn , lesh spiceyn , myr va cliaghtey ny Hewnyn dy oanluckey .
Son va chymmey eu orrym’s ayns my gheulaghyn , as ghow shiu dy arryltagh rish spooilley nyn gooid , toiggal ayndiu hene dy vel nyn gour cooid share as s’beayn ayns niau .
Jeh sluight y dooinney shoh ta Jee , cordail rish e ghialdyn , er hroggal seose da Israel Saualtagh Yeesey :
Agh myr te scruit , Cha vel sooill er vakin , ny cleaysh er chlashtyn , chamoo te ayns cree dooinney dy hoiggal ny reddyn ta Jee er chiarail er ny son ocsyn ta graihagh ersyn .

Agh my ta’n Spyrryd echeysyn hrog seose Yeesey veih ny merriu , baghey ayndiu ; nee eshyn hrog Creest veih ny merriu , ny kirp marvaanagh euish myrgeddin y vioghey , liorish e Spyrryd ta cummal ayndiu .
Ta’n Spyrryd hene gymmyrkey feanish lesh y spyrryd ain , dy vel shin nyn gloan dy Yee .
Ny bee-jee mollit ; cha vel craid dy ve jeant mysh Jee : son cre-erbee ta dooinney dy chuirr , lheid shen nee eh ’vuinn .
Cur-my-ner er-y-fa shen mieys as briwnys gyere Yee : orroosyn ren tuittym , briwnys gyere ; agh ort’s , mieys , my t’ou tannaghtyn ayns e vieys : er aght elley bee uss myrgeddin giarit jeh .

Fark-jee er-y-fa shen , vraaraghyn , derrey cheet y Chiarn . Cur-my-ner , ta’n eirinnagh farkiagh son mess berchagh y thallooin , as t’eh farkiagh foddey er y hon , derrey hig fliaghey cooie ny imbaghyn .
Dy der y Chiarn myghin da lught-thie Onesiphorus ; son ren eh dy mennick m’y ooraghey , as cha row nearey er jeh my gheuley .
As nish , chloan veggey , tannee-jee aynsyn : tra hig eh kionfenish , dy vod dunnallys ’ve ain , as nagh bee mayd er nyn goyrt gys nearey ec y cheet echey .
Shoh ta mee gra eisht , Ymmyrk-jee shiu hene lurg y Spyrryd , as cha jean shiu cooilleeney sayntyn ny foalley .
Ta shoh raa firrinagh , as feeu ard-soiagh ve jeant jeh , dy daink Yeesey Creest gys y theihll dy hauail peccee ; jeu ta mish yn ard er .
Er-jerrey , my vraaraghyn , bee-jee niartal ayns y Chiarn , as ayns pooar e hroshid .
Shen-y-fa lhig dasyn ta smooinaghtyn dy vel eh ny hassoo , kiarail y ghoaill nagh duitt eh .
Son liorish un oural t’eh er heyrey adsyn son dy bragh ta er nyn gasherickey :
Eisht hrog ny Hewnyn claghyn reesht dy chlaghey eh .
Agh baillym shiu dy hoiggal dy nee Creest kione dy chooilley ghooinney ; as y dooinney kione e ven ; as dy nee Jee kione Chreest .
As va feallagh elley er nyn browal lesh craid dewil , as scuitchal , dy jarroo myrgeddin lesh geulaghyn as pryssooney .
Yn treishteil shen t’ain myr aker ny hanmey , shickyr as gyn scughey , as ta gentreil gys yn ayrn er cheu-sthie jeh’n ynnyd smoo casherick ,
As ny lhig da sheshaght erbee ’ve eu rish obbraghyn neu-vessoil y dorraghys , agh ny sleaie cur oghsan daue :

Ny loayr-jee olk yn derrey yeh jeh’n jeh elley , vraaraghyn . Eshyn ta goltooaney e vraar , as briwnys e vraar , t’eh goltooaney yn leigh , as briwnys y leigh : agh my t’ou briwnys y leigh , cha vel oo cooilleeney’n leigh , agh jannoo oo hene dty vriw .
As va’n daa ghiat yeig daa phearl jeig ; va dagh giat er hene jeh un phearl : as va straid yn ard-valley airh ghlen , myr dy beagh eh gless sollys .
Agh Creest myr Mac harrish e hie hene : yn thie echeysyn ta shin , my ta shin cummal shickyr y dunnallys as boggey nyn dreishteil gys y jerrey .
Lhig da graih ve fegooish foalsaght . Cur-jee dwoaie da shen ta olk , lhiann-jee gys shen ta mie .

As ’syn oor cheddin va craa mooar thallooin ayn , as huitt yn jeihoo ayrn jeh’n ard-valley , as ayns y craa-thallooin v’er nyn stroie shiaght thousane dooinney : as v’adsyn va er-mayrn atchimagh , as hug ad gloyr da Jee t’ayns niau .
Nish cha vel fer ta loayrt eddyr jees loayrt son unnane ny-lomarcan , agh ta Jee unnane .
Eisht dooyrt Pilate rish , Nagh loayr oo rhym’s ? nagh vel fys ayd dy vel pooar aym’s dy dty chrossey , as pooar dy dty eaysley ?
Yn ayrn jeh’n scriptyr v’eh dy lhaih , she shoh ve , V’eh er ny leeideil myr keyrrey gys y skynn , as myr yn eayn balloo roish e lommyrtagh , myr shen cha doshil eshyn e veeal :
As ny lurg shen yeearree ad ree : as hug Jee daue Saul mac Cis , dooinney jeh sheeloghe Benjamin , son da-eed bleïn .
Son ta ayn ymmodee mee-reilltee , branladee , as molteyryn , erskyn ooilley adsyn ta jeh’n ghiarey-chymmylt :
Ayn va dy chooilley vonney dy veïyn kiare-chassagh y thallooin , dy veïyn feïe , as cretooryn snauee , as eeanlee yn aer .
As y ghloyr hug uss dooys , ta mish er chur dauesyn : dy vod ad ve unnane , eer myr ta shinyn unnane .
Cumm shickyr bun ny goan slayntoil , t’ou er chlashtyn voym’s , ayns credjue as graih ta ayns Creest Yeesey .
As va soit ayns shen shey siyn cloaie ry-hoi ushtey , lurg cliaghtey ny Hewnyn son glenney , cummal ghaa ny three dy firkinyn y pheesh .
Dooisht-jee gys cairys , as ny cur-jee rish peccah ; son ta paart nagh vel tushtey oc dy Yee : ta mee gra shoh gys y nearey eu .
Ayns dy chooilley injillid as meenid , lesh surranse-foddey , gymmyrkey yn derrey yeh lesh y jeh elley ayns graih ;
As feallagh elley saue-jee lesh aggle , myr dy beagh shiu dy hayrn ad ass yn aile ; coyrt feoh eer da’n gharmad sollit liorish yn eill .
As ta fys ain dy vel dy chooilley nhee gobbraghey cooidjagh son y chooid share , dauesyn ta graihagh er Jee , dauesyn t’er nyn eam cordail rish e aigney .
Son ta’n viallys euish er ny imraa mastey dy chooilley ghooinney . Ta mee er-y-fa shen goaill boggey er y lieh eu : agh ny-yeih baillym shiu ve tastagh gys shen ny ta mie , as ôney mychione olk .
Ayn va’n censer airhey , as arg y chonaant coodit er dy chooilley heu lesh airh , ayn va’n saagh airh , ayn va manna , as lorg Aaron ren blaaghey , as buird y chonaant ;
Cre vel boggys eisht ? te giarit magh . Liorish cre’n leigh ? nee jeh obbraghyn ? Cha nee : agh liorish y leigh dy chredjue .
Nagh vel oo credjal dy vel mish ayns yn Ayr , as yn Ayr aynym’s ? ny goan ta mish dy loayrt riu , cha vel mee loayrt jee’m pene : agh yn Ayr ta tannaghtyn aynym , eshyn ta jannoo ny obbraghyn .
As dirree yn pobble magh nyn ’oï : as raip ny fir-reill nyn eaddagh jeu , as doardee ad ad dy ve scuitchit .
Sarey noa ta mee dy choyrt diu , Shiu dy ve graihagh yn derrey yeh er y jeh elley ; myr ta mish er ve graihagh erriuish , dy der shiuish myrgeddin graih yn derrey yeh da’n jeh elley .

Son ta fys ain , dy beagh y thie thallooinagh ain jeh’n chabbane shoh er ny choyrt naardey , dy vel ynnyd-vaghee ain veih Jee , thie nagh vel jeant lesh laueyn , dy bragh farraghtyn ayns ny niaughyn .
Hrog Yeesey seose e choraa as dooyrt eh , Eshyn ta credjal aynym’s , cha nee aynym’s t’eh credjal , agh aynsyn t’er my choyrt .
Eisht dreggyr Ananias , Hiarn , ta mee er chlashtyn veih fer ny ghaa jeh’n dooinney shoh , dy mooar yn aggair t’eh er n’yannoo da dty nooghyn’s ec Jerusalem .
Son bee ooilley er nyn son oc hene , sayntoilee , boggyssee , mooaralee , oltooanee , mee-viallagh gys ayraghyn as moiraghyn , neu-wooisal , mee-chrauee ,
Foddey smoo eisht , myr ta shin nish er nyn seyrey liorish e uill , bee mayd er nyn sauail voish jymmoose ny hrooidsyn .
Ta fys as shickyrys aym ayns y Chiarn Yeesey , nagh vel nhee erbee neu-ghlen jeh hene ; agh dasyn er-lesh ta nhee erbee neu-ghlen , da shoh te neu-ghlen .
My nee oo ny braaraghyn y choyrt ayns cooinaghtyn jeh ny reddyn shoh , bee oo dty hirveishagh vie dy Yeesey Creest , troggit ayns goan y chredjue , as ynsagh mie , huggey t’ou er roshtyn .
